  7208                                  
  7209                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7210                                  ;
  7211                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7212                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7213                                  ;
  7214                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7215                                  ;
  7216                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7217                                  ;   initialize it.
  7218                                  ;
  7219                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7220                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7221                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7222                                  ;
  7223                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7224                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7225                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7226                                  ;
  7227                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7228                                  ;   save coding.
  7229                                  ;
  7230                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7231                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7232                                  ;
  7233                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7234                                  ;
  7235                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7236                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7237                                  ;
  7238                                  ; called modules:
  7239                                  ;		  getboot
  7240                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7241                                  ;

  7253 00002163 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles

  7256                                  		;cmp	dh, 0

  7263 00002174 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7264                                  					; DL = drive number
  7265                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7266                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7267                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7268 00002176 FEC6                    		inc	dh

  7290                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  7292                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7293                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7294                                  
  7295                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7296                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7297                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7298                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7299                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7300                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7301                                  ;
  7302                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7303                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7304                                  
  7305                                  
  7306                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7307 0000219D 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7308                                  fmpnext:				
  7309 000021A1 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7310 000021A5 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7311 000021A7 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7312 000021AA 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7313 000021AE 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7314                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7315                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7316                                  fmpnextfound:
  7317 000021B0 C3                      		retn
  7318                                  
  7319                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7320                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7321                                  ;fmpret:
  7322                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7323                                  
  7324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7325                                  
  7326                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7327                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7328 000021B1 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7329 000021B4 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7330 000021B6 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7331 000021BA C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7332                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7333 000021BF 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7334                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7335                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7336 000021C3 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7337                                  					; ffHardFile
  7338 000021C7 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7339 000021CC A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7340 000021CF 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7341 000021D2 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7342 000021D5 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7343 000021D8 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7344 000021DB 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7345                                  					; set physical number
  7346 000021DE A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7347 000021E1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7348                                  					; set logical number
  7349 000021E4 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7350 000021E9 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7351 000021EB 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7352                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7353 000021F0 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7354                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7355                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7356 000021F2 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7357 000021F5 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7358 000021F9 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7359 000021FC D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7360 000021FE D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7361 00002200 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7362 00002204 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7363                                  					; set hidden trks
  7364 00002207 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7365 0000220B 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7366 0000220F 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7367 00002213 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7368 00002216 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7369 00002219 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7370                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7371                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7372                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7373 0000221B 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7374 0000221D BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7375 00002220 06                      		push	es
  7376 00002221 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7377                                  					; bx value saved.
  7378 00002224 07                      		pop	es
  7379 00002225 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7380 00002227 E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7381                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7382 0000222A E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7383                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7385                                  
  7386                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7387                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7388                                  		;retn

  7395                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7396                                  	
  7397 0000222D 57                      		push	di
  7398 0000222E 53                      		push	bx
  7399 0000222F 1E                      		push	ds
  7400 00002230 06                      		push	es
  7401                                  setmini_1:				
  7402 00002231 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7403 00002235 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7404 00002237 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7405 0000223B 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7406 0000223D 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7407 00002241 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7408 00002243 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7409 00002246 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7410 0000224A 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7411 0000224C F9                      		stc
  7412 0000224D 07                      		pop	es
  7413 0000224E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7414 0000224F 5B                      		pop	bx
  7415 00002250 5F                      		pop	di
  7416 00002251 C3                      		retn
  7417                                  
  7418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7419                                  setmini_2:				
  7420 00002252 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7421

  7423                                  
  7424                                  ; 15/10/2022

  7426                                  ;
  7427                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7428                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7429                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7430                                  ;
  7431                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7432                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7433                                  ;			trash ax
  7434                                  
  7435                                  dmax_check:	
  7436 00002255 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7437 0000225A 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7438 0000225C 06                      		push	es
  7439                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7440 0000225D B85704                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7441 00002260 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax

  7444                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7445                                  					; set message flag
  7446                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7447 00002268 07                      		pop	es
  7448                                  
  7449                                  		;;push	es
  7450                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7451                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7452                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7453                                  					; set message flag
  7454                                  		;;pop	es
  7455                                  		;
  7456                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7457                                  dmax_ok:				
  7458 00002269 C3                      		retn
  7459                                  
  7460                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7461                                  
  7462                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7463                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7464                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7465                                  ;								 
  7466                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7467                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7468                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7469                                  
  7470                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7471 0000226A 56                      		push	si
  7472 0000226B 53                      		push	bx
  7473 0000226C 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7474                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7475 00002270 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7476 00002273 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7477                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7478 00002275 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7479 00002277 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7481                                  
  7482                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7483                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7484 00002279 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7485                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7486 0000227B 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7487                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7488 0000227E C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7489                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7490 00002282 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7491                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7492                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7493 00002285 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7494 00002288 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7495 0000228C 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7496 0000228E 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7497 00002293 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7498 00002297 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7499 0000229C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7500 0000229D 5E                      		pop	si
  7501 0000229E C3                      		retn
  7502                                  
  7503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7504                                  
  7505                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7506                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7507                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7509                                  
  7510                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7511 0000229F 50                      		push	ax
  7512 000022A0 51                      		push	cx
  7513 000022A1 52                      		push	dx
  7514 000022A2 55                      		push	bp
  7515 000022A3 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7516                                  loop_clock:				
  7517 000022A5 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7518 000022A7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7519 000022A9 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7520 000022AB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7521                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7522                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7523                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7524 000022AD 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7525 000022B0 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7526 000022B2 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7527 000022B5 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7528 000022B7 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7529 000022BA 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7530 000022BC 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7531 000022BD B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7532                                  delay:					
  7533 000022C0 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7534 000022C2 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7535                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7536                                  
  7537                                  clock_present:				
  7538 000022C4 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7539 000022CA E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7540                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7541                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7542 000022CD 56                      		push	si
  7543 000022CE E858F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7544 000022D1 FA                      		cli
  7545                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7546 000022D2 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7547 000022D6 FB                      		sti
  7548 000022D7 5E                      		pop	si
  7549                                  
  7550                                  no_readdate:				
  7551 000022D8 5D                      		pop	bp
  7552 000022D9 5A                      		pop	dx
  7553 000022DA 59                      		pop	cx
  7554 000022DB 58                      		pop	ax
  7555 000022DC C3                      		retn
  7556                                  
  7557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7558                                  
  7559                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7560                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7561                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7562                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7563                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7564                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7565                                  ;
  7566                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7567                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7568                                  ;
  7569                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7570                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7571                                  ;
  7572                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7573                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7574                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7575                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7576                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7577                                  ;
  7578                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7579                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7580                                  
  7581                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7582                                  
  7583                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7584                                  
  7585                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7586                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7587                                  			
  7588 000022DD 50                      		push	ax
  7589 000022DE 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7590 000022E4 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7591 000022E6 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7592                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7593 000022EC 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7594 000022EE 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7595                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7596 000022F4 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7597                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7598                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7599                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7600                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7601                                  cmosck4:				
  7602 000022F6 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7603                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7604 000022F8 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7605                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7606 000022FA E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7607 000022FD B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7608                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7609 000022FF E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7610 00002302 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7611                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7612 00002304 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7613 00002306 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7614                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7615 00002308 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7616                                  cmosck9:				
  7617 0000230B 58                      		pop	ax
  7618 0000230C C3                      		retn
  7619                                  
  7620                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7621                                  
  7622                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7623                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7624                                  ;									       :
  7625                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7626                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7627                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7628                                  ;									       :
  7629                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7630                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7631                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7632                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7633                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7634                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7635                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7636                                  
  7637                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7638 0000230D 9C                      		pushf
  7639 0000230E FA                      		cli
  7640 0000230F 53                      		push	bx
  7641 00002310 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7642 00002311 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7643 00002313 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7644                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7645 00002315 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7646 00002316 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7647 00002318 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7648 0000231A 58                      		pop	ax
  7649 0000231B 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7650 0000231D 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7651 0000231F E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7652                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7653 00002321 90                      		nop
  7654 00002322 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7655 00002324 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7656 00002326 5B                      		pop	bx
  7657 00002327 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7658 00002328 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7659 0000232B C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7660                                  
  7661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7662                                  
  7663                                  cmos_popf:				
  7664 0000232C CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7665                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7666                                  
  7667                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7668                                  
  7669                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7670                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7671                                  ;									       :
  7672                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7673                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7674                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7675                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7676                                  ;									       :
  7677                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7678                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7679                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7680                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7681                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7682                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7683                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7684                                  
  7685                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7686 0000232D 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7687 0000232E 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7688 0000232F FA                      		cli
  7689 00002330 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7690 00002331 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7691 00002333 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7692                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7693 00002335 90                      		nop
  7694 00002336 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7695 00002338 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7696 0000233A 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7697 0000233B 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7698 0000233D 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7699 0000233F E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7700                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7701 00002341 90                      		nop
  7702 00002342 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7703 00002344 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7704 00002345 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7705 00002346 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7706 00002349 C3                      		retn
  7707                                  
  7708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7709                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7711                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7713                                  
  7714                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7715                                  ;
  7716                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7717                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7718                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7719                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7720                                  
  7721                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7722                                  
  7723                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7724                                  ;
  7725                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7726                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7727                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7728                                  
  7729                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7730                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7731                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7732                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7733                                  
  7734                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7735                                  getclus:				
  7736 0000234A 51                      		push	cx
  7737 0000234B 57                      		push	di
  7738 0000234C 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7739 00002351 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7740 00002353 48                      		dec	ax
  7741 00002354 48                      		dec	ax
  7742 00002355 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7743                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7744                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7745 00002357 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7746 0000235C 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7747                                  unpack:					
  7748 00002361 1E                      		push	ds
  7749 00002362 50                      		push	ax
  7750 00002363 53                      		push	bx
  7751 00002364 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7752 00002369 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7753 0000236B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7754 0000236D 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7755                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7756 00002373 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7757 00002375 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7758                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7759 00002377 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7760                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7761 00002379 52                      		push	dx
  7762 0000237A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7763 0000237C E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7764 0000237F 5A                      		pop	dx
  7765 00002380 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7766 00002382 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7767                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7768                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7769 00002384 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7770 00002388 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7771 00002389 52                      		push	dx
  7772 0000238A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7773 0000238C E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7774 0000238F 5A                      		pop	dx
  7775                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7776 00002390 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7777 00002393 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7778 00002397 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7779                                  even_odd:				
  7780 0000239B 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7781 0000239C 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7782 0000239D D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7783 0000239F 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7784 000023A1 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7785                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7786 000023A3 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7787 000023A5 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7788 000023A7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7789                                  havclus:				
  7790 000023A9 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7791 000023AB 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7792 000023AF EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7794                                  
  7795                                  unpack16:				
  7796 000023B1 52                      		push	dx
  7797 000023B2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7798 000023B4 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7799 000023B6 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7800 000023B9 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7801 000023BC 5A                      		pop	dx
  7802 000023BD 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7803                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7804                                  unpackx:				
  7805 000023BF 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7806 000023C0 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7807 000023C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  7808 000023C2 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7809 000023C4 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7810 000023C7 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7811 000023C9 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7812 000023CE EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7814                                  
  7815                                  getcl2:					
  7816 000023D0 53                      		push	bx
  7817 000023D1 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7818 000023D2 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7819 000023D3 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7820 000023D7 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7821 000023DC 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7822 000023DD 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7823                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7824 000023E2 1E                      		push	ds
  7825 000023E3 0E                      		push	cs
  7826 000023E4 1F                      		pop	ds
  7827 000023E5 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7828                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7829 000023E6 BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7830                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7831                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7832 000023E9 E879F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7833 000023EC 1F                      		pop	ds
  7834 000023ED 5B                      		pop	bx
  7835 000023EE 5F                      		pop	di
  7836 000023EF 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7837 000023F3 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7838 000023F5 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7839 000023F7 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7840 000023F9 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7841 000023FA C3                      		retn
  7842                                  
  7843                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7844                                  
  7845                                  
  7846                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7847                                  ;
  7848                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7849                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7850                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7851                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7852                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7853                                  ;
  7854                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7855                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7856                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7857                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7858                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7859                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7860                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7861                                  
  7862                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7863                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7864 000023FB 50                      		push	ax
  7865 000023FC 51                      		push	cx
  7866 000023FD 57                      		push	di
  7867 000023FE 56                      		push	si
  7868 000023FF 06                      		push	es
  7869 00002400 1E                      		push	ds
  7870 00002401 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7871 00002403 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7872 00002408 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7873 0000240A 90                      		nop
  7874                                  
  7875                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7876                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7877                                  
  7878 0000240B 06                      		push	es
  7879 0000240C 1E                      		push	ds
  7880 0000240D 57                      		push	di
  7881 0000240E 50                      		push	ax
  7882 0000240F 0E                      		push	cs
  7883 00002410 1F                      		pop	ds
  7884                                  
  7885 00002411 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7886 00002415 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7887                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7888                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7889 00002418 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7890 00002419 E849F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7891 0000241C 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7892 0000241D 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7893                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7894 00002421 5F                      		pop	di
  7895 00002422 1F                      		pop	ds
  7896 00002423 07                      		pop	es
  7897 00002424 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7898 00002429 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7899 0000242B 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7900                                  					; sector number
  7901                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7902 0000242F 52                      		push	dx
  7903 00002430 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7904                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7905                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7906 00002437 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7907 00002439 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7908 0000243C 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7909 00002440 1E                      		push	ds
  7910 00002441 07                      		pop	es
  7911 00002442 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7912 00002444 1E                      		push	ds
  7913 00002445 0E                      		push	cs
  7914 00002446 1F                      		pop	ds
  7915 00002447 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7916 00002448 BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7917                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7918                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7919 0000244B E817F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7920 0000244E 1F                      		pop	ds
  7921 0000244F 5A                      		pop	dx
  7922 00002450 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7923                                  
  7924                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7925 00002455 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7926 00002456 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7927                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7928                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7929 00002458 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7930 0000245A 1F                      		pop	ds
  7931 0000245B 07                      		pop	es
  7932 0000245C 5E                      		pop	si
  7933 0000245D 5F                      		pop	di
  7934 0000245E 59                      		pop	cx
  7935 0000245F 58                      		pop	ax
  7936 00002460 C3                      		retn
  7937                                  
  7938                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7939                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7940                                  
  7941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7942                                  
  7943                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7944                                  		;db 0
  7945                                  
  7946                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7947                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7948                                  
  7949                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  7950 00002461 00<rep Fh>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7951                                  %endif
  7952

  7956                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7957                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7958
