  7966                                  ;============================================================================
  7967                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7968                                  ;============================================================================
  7969                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7970                                  
  7971                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7972                                  
  7973                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7974                                   
  7975                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7976                                  
  7977                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7979                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7980                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7981                                  
  7982                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7983 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7984 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7985                                  
  7986                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7987                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7988                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7989                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7990                                  
  7991                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7992                                  
  7993                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7994                                  
  7995                                  ;************************************************************************
  7996                                  ;*									*
  7997                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7998                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7999                                  ;*									*
  8000                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8001                                  ;*									*
  8002                                  ;************************************************************************
  8003                                  
  8004                                  _seg_reinit:
  8005 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8006                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8007                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8008 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8009 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8010                                  
  8011                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  8012 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8013 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8014 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8015 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8016 00000042 CB                      		retf
  8017                                  
  8018                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8019                                  
  8020                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8021                                  
  8022                                  ;************************************************************************
  8023                                  ;*									*
  8024                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8025                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8026                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8027                                  ;*									*
  8028                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8029                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8030                                  ;*									*
  8031                                  ;************************************************************************
  8032                                  
  8033                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8034 00000043 56                      		push	si
  8035 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  8036 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  8037 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  8038 00000047 57                      		push	di
  8039 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  8040 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  8041 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  8042 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  8043 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8044 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8045                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8046                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8047 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8048 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8049 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8050 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8051 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8052 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8053 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8054 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8055 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8056 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8057                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8058 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8059                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8060                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8061 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8062                                  
  8063                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8064                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8065                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8066                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8067                                  ;
  8068                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8069                                  ;
  8070                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8071                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8072                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8073                                  ;
  8074                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8075                                  
  8076                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8077 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8078 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8079 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8080 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8081                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8082                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8083 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8084 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8085                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8086                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8087 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8088 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8089 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8090 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8091 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8092 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8093 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8094 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8095 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8096 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8097                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8098 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8099                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8100 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8101 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8102                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8103                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8104                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8105                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8106 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8107                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8108 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8109 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8110                                  					; mark operation complete
  8111 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8112 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8113 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8114 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8115 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8116 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8117 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8118 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8119 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8120 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8121                                  	
  8122                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8123                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8124                                  bc_retf:
  8125 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8127                                  
  8128                                  command_error:				
  8129 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8130 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8131                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8132                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8133                                  
  8134                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8135                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8136                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8137                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8138                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8139                                  ; high.
  8140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8141                                  
  8142                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8143                                  
  8144                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8145                                  
  8146 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8147                                  
  8148 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8149                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8150                                  		
  8151                                  
  8152                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8153                                  
  8154                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8155                                  
  8156                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8157 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8158                                  					; unknown command error
  8159                                  
  8160                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8161                                  
  8162                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8163                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8164                                  
  8165                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8166                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8167                                  
  8168                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8169                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8170                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8171 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8172 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8173                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8174 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8175 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8176 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8177                                  
  8178                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8179                                  
  8180                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8181                                  
  8182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8183                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8185                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8186                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8187                                  
  8188                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8189                                  
  8190                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8191                                  
  8192                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8193                                  
  8194                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8195                                  
  8196                                  ;************************************************************************
  8197                                  ;*									*
  8198                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8199                                  ;*									*
  8200                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8201                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8202                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8203                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8204                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8205                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8206                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8207                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8208                                  ;*									*
  8209                                  ;************************************************************************
  8210                                  
  8211                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8212                                  		;db 0
  8213                                  
  8214                                  		; 13/12/202
  8215 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8216                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8217 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8218                                  					; 00 init
  8219 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8220 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8221 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8222                                  					; 03
  8223 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8224                                  					; 04
  8225 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8226                                  					; 05
  8227 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8228 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8229                                  					; 07
  8230 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8231                                  					; 08
  8232 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8233 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8234                                  con_table_end:
  8235 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8236                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8237 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8238 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8239 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8240 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8241 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8242                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8243 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8244                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8245 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8246 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8247 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8248 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8249 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8250 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8251 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8252 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8253 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8254 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8255 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8256 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8257 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8258 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8259 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8260 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8261 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8262 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8263 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8264 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8265                                  prn_table_end:
  8266 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8267                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8268 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8269 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8270 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8271 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8272 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8273 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8274 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8275 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8276 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8277 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8278 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8279                                  aux_table_end:
  8280 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8281                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8282 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8283 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8284 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8285 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8286 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8287 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8288 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8289 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8290 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8291 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8292                                  tim_table_end:
  8293                                  
  8294                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8295                                  
  8296                                  ;************************************************************************
  8297                                  ;*									*
  8298                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8299                                  ;*									*
  8300                                  ;************************************************************************
  8301                                  
  8302                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8303                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8304 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8305                                  con_loop:				
  8306 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8307 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8308 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8309                                  con_exit:				
  8310 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8311 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8312                                  
  8313                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8314                                  
  8315                                  ;************************************************************************
  8316                                  ;*									*
  8317                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8318                                  ;*									*
  8319                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8320                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8321                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8322                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8323                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8324                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8325                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8326                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8327                                  ;*									*
  8328                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8329                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8330                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8331                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8332                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8333                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8334                                  ;*									*
  8335                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8336                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8337                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8338                                  ;*									*
  8339                                  ;************************************************************************
  8340                                  
  8341                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8342                                  chrin:		
  8343 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8344 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8345 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8346 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8347 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8348 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8349 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8350 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8351 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8352 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8353 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8354 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8356                                  
  8357                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8358                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8359                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8360                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8361                                  ;      else
  8362                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8363                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8364                                  ;      endif
  8365                                  ;    endif
  8366                                  ;  endif
  8367                                  
  8368                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8369 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8370 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8371 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8372 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8373 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8374 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8375 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8376 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8378                                  
  8379                                  not_ext:				
  8380 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8381 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8382                                  alt_save:				
  8383 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8384                                  keyret:					
  8385 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8386                                  
  8387                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8388                                  
  8389                                  ;************************************************************************
  8390                                  ;*									*
  8391                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8392                                  ;*									*
  8393                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8394                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8395                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8396                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8397                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8398                                  ;*									*
  8399                                  ;************************************************************************
  8400                                  
  8401                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8402                                  con_rdnd:				
  8403 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8404 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8405 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8406 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8407 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8408 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8409 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8410 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8411 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8412                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8413 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8414                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8415 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8416 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8417 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8418 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8419                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8420                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8421                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8422                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8423 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8424 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8425 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8427                                  
  8428                                  gotchr:					
  8429 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8430 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8431 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8432 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8433 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8435                                  
  8436                                  notbrk:					
  8437 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8438 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8439 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8440 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8442                                  
  8443                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8444 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8445 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8446 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8447 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8448 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8449 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8450 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8451                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8452                                  rdexit:					
  8453 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8454 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8455                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8456                                  bc_exvec:				
  8457 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8458                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8459 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8461                                  
  8462                                  ;************************************************************************
  8463                                  ;*									*
  8464                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8465                                  ;*									*
  8466                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8467                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8468                                  ;*									*
  8469                                  ;************************************************************************
  8470                                  
  8471                                  con_writ:
  8472                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8473 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8474                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8475                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8476                                  con_lp:					
  8477 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8478 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8479 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8480                                  					; AL = character to display
  8481 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8482                                  cc_ret:					
  8483 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8484 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8485                                  
  8486                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ;************************************************************************
  8489                                  ;*									*
  8490                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8491                                  ;*									*
  8492                                  ;************************************************************************
  8493                                  
  8494                                  con_flush:
  8495 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8496                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8497 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8498 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8499                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8500                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8501                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8502 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8503 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8504 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8505                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8506 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8507                                  
  8508                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8509                                  
  8510                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8511                                  
  8512                                  ;************************************************************************
  8513                                  ;*									*
  8514                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8515                                  ;*									*
  8516                                  ;************************************************************************
  8517                                  
  8518                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8519                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8520                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8521                                  
  8522                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8523                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8524                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8525                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8526                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8527                                  ;
  8528                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8529                                  
  8530                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8531                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8532                                  
  8533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8534                                  
  8535                                  ;************************************************************************
  8536                                  ;*									*
  8537                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8538                                  ;*									*
  8539                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8540                                  ;*									*
  8541                                  ;************************************************************************
  8542                                  
  8543                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8544 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8545                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8546                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8547                                  prn_done:
  8548 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8549 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8550                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8551                                  
  8552                                  ;************************************************************************
  8553                                  ;*									*
  8554                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8555                                  ;*									*
  8556                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8557                                  ;*									*
  8558                                  ;************************************************************************
  8559                                  
  8560                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8561                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8562 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8563                                  prn_loop:				
  8564 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8565                                  prn_out:				
  8566 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8567 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8568 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8569 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8570 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8571 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8572 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8573 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8574 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8575 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8576 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8578                                  
  8579                                  _prnwf:					
  8580 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8581 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8582                                  TestPrnError:				
  8583 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8584 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8585                                  pmessg:					
  8586 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8588                                  
  8589                                  prn_con:

  8591 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8592                                  ;prn_done:				
  8593                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8594                                  prn_done2:
  8595                                  		;clc
  8596                                  		; cf=0
  8597 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8599                                  
  8600                                  ;************************************************************************
  8601                                  ;*									*
  8602                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8603                                  ;*									*
  8604                                  ;************************************************************************
  8605                                  
  8606                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8607 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8608 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8609 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8610                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8611                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8612 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8613 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8615                                  
  8616                                  ;************************************************************************
  8617                                  ;*									*
  8618                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8619                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8620                                  ;*									*
  8621                                  ;************************************************************************
  8622                                  
  8623                                  prnstat:				
  8624 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8625                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8626                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8627                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8628                                  
  8629                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8630                                  
  8631                                  ;************************************************************************
  8632                                  ;*									*
  8633                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8634                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8635                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8636                                  ;*									*
  8637                                  ;************************************************************************
  8638                                  
  8639                                  prnop:	
  8640 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8641 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8642                                  
  8643                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8644                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8645                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8646                                  
  8647 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8648 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8649 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8650 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8651 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8652 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8653 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8654                                  
  8655                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8656                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8657                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8658                                  
  8659                                  NextTest:				
  8660 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8661                                  					; i/o error?
  8662 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8663                                  
  8664                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8665                                  
  8666 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8667                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8668 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8669 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8670 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8671                                  ret1:					
  8672 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8674                                  
  8675                                  checknotready:				
  8676 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8677 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8678 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8679                                  
  8680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8681                                  
  8682                                  ;************************************************************************
  8683                                  ;*									*
  8684                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8685                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8686                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8687                                  ;*									*
  8688                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8689                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8690                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8691                                  ;*									*
  8692                                  ;************************************************************************
  8693                                  
  8694                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8695                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8696 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8697                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8698 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8699 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8700 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8701 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8702 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8703                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8704 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8705 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8706                                  prn_getstat:				
  8707 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8708 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8709 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8710 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8711 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8712 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8713 000002A6 26                      		es
  8714 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8715                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8716                                  					; lodsb
  8717 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8718 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8719 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8720 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8721                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8722                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8723                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8724 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8725                                  
  8726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8727                                  
  8728                                  prn_bperr:				
  8729 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8730                                  prn_berr:				
  8731 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8733                                  
  8734                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8735                                  
  8736                                  ;************************************************************************
  8737                                  ;*									*
  8738                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8739                                  ;*									*
  8740                                  ;************************************************************************
  8741                                  
  8742                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8743                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8744                                  
  8745                                  ;********************************;*
  8746                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8747                                  ;********************************;*
  8748                                  
  8749                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8750                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8751                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8752                                  
  8753                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8754                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8755                                  ;;endstruc
  8756                                  
  8757                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8758                                  
  8759                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8760                                  
  8761                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8762                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8763 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8764 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8765                                  					; ioc_pc
  8766 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8767                                  
  8768                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8769 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8771                                  
  8772                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8773 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8774 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8775 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8776                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8777 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8778 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8779                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8780 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8781 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8782 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8783 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8784 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8785 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8786                                  prngetcount:				
  8787                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8788 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8789 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8790                                  					; return current retry count
  8791                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8792                                  		; cf=0
  8793                                  		;clc
  8794 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8796                                  
  8797                                  ;************************************************************************
  8798                                  ;*									*
  8799                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8800                                  ;*									*
  8801                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8802                                  ;************************************************************************
  8803                                  
  8804                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8805 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8806 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8807                                  					; ioc_pc
  8808 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8809 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8810 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8811 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8812 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8813 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8814                                  IOCtlSupported:

  8817                                  		;clc

  8821                                  prn_query_err:
  8822                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8823                                  		;stc
  8824 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8826                                  
  8827                                  ;************************************************************************
  8828                                  ;*									*
  8829                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8830                                  ;*									*
  8831                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8832                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8833                                  ;*									*
  8834                                  ;************************************************************************
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8837                                  
  8838                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8839                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8840                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8843                                  
  8844                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8845                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8846                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8847                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8848                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8849                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8850                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8851                                  
  8852                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8855                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8856                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8857                                  
  8858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8859                                  
  8860                                  ;************************************************************************
  8861                                  ;*									*
  8862                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8863                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8864                                  ;*									*
  8865                                  ;************************************************************************
  8866                                  
  8867                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8868                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8869 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8870 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8871 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8872 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8873 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8874 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8875                                  aux1:					
  8876 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8877                                  					; won't return if error
  8878                                  aux2:					
  8879 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8880 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8881                                  exvec2:					
  8882 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8883                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8884 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8886                                  
  8887                                  ;************************************************************************
  8888                                  ;*									*
  8889                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8890                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8891                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8892                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8893                                  ;*									*
  8894                                  ;************************************************************************
  8895                                  
  8896                                  auxin:					
  8897 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8898 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8899 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8900                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8901                                  		;retn
  8902                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8903 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8905                                  
  8906                                  arbad:					
  8907 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8908 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8909 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8910 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8911                                  
  8912                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8913                                  
  8914                                  ;************************************************************************
  8915                                  ;*									*
  8916                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8917                                  ;*									*
  8918                                  ;************************************************************************
  8919                                  
  8920                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8921 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8922 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8923 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8924 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8925 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8926 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8927 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8928 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8929 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8930 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8931 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8932                                  auxdrx:					
  8933 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8935                                  
  8936                                  auxbus:					
  8937 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8938                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8939                                  
  8940                                  ;************************************************************************
  8941                                  ;*									*
  8942                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8943                                  ;*									*
  8944                                  ;************************************************************************
  8945                                  
  8946                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8947 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8948 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8949 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8950 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8951 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8952                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8953                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8954                                  		;clc
  8955 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8956                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8957                                  
  8958                                  ;************************************************************************
  8959                                  ;*									*
  8960                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8961                                  ;*									*
  8962                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8963                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8964                                  ;*									*
  8965                                  ;************************************************************************
  8966                                  
  8967                                  auxstat:				
  8968 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8969                                  
  8970                                  		; fall into auxop
  8971                                  
  8972                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8973

  8979                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*

  8986                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8987                                  					; get port number
  8988 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8989                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8990                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8991 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8992                                  
  8993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8994                                  
  8995                                  ;************************************************************************
  8996                                  ;*									*
  8997                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8998                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8999                                  ;*									*
  9000                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9001                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9002                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9003                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9004                                  ;*									*

  9010                                  					; zero out buffer
  9011                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9012                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9013                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9014 00000369 C3                      		retn

  9016

  9024                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9025 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022

  9035 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines

  9037

  9040                                  					; still	more character to print
  9041                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return

  9044 00000381 C3                      		retn
