 11056                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11057                                  
 11058                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11059                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11060                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11061                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11062                                  
 11063                                  do_write:				
 11064 00000B10 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11065 00000B14 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11066 00000B16 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11067 00000B1A 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11068                                  
 11069                                  do_norm:				
 11070 00000B1C E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11071 00000B1F EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11073                                  
 11074                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11075                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11076                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11077                                  
 11078                                  doverify:				
 11079 00000B21 58                      		pop	ax
 11080 00000B22 50                      		push	ax
 11081 00000B23 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11082 00000B25 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11083 00000B28 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11084                                  
 11085                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11086                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11087                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11088                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11089                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11090                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11091                                  
 11092 00000B2A 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11093 00000B2D 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11094 00000B2F FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11095 00000B33 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11096 00000B35 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11097 00000B38 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11098                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11099                                  
 11100                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11101 00000B3A E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11102 00000B3D FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11103 00000B41 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11104                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11105                                  
 11106                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11107                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11108                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11109                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11110                                  
 11111                                  dskerr:					
 11112 00000B43 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11113 00000B48 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11114 00000B4A E8220D                  		call	checkio
 11115                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11116 00000B4D 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11117 00000B52 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11118 00000B54 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11119 00000B57 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11120                                  dochkagain:				
 11121 00000B5C E8AA00                  		call	again
 11122                                  dskerr0:				
 11123 00000B5F 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11124 00000B61 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11125                                  					; fnon_removable
 11126 00000B66 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11127 00000B68 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11128 00000B6B 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11129                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11130 00000B6D 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11131 00000B70 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11132 00000B72 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11133                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11134                                  dskerr1:				
 11135 00000B78 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11136                                  		;jmp	retry
 11137                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11138 00000B79 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11140                                  
 11141                                  write_fault_err:			
 11142 00000B7C BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11143                                  					; for write fault error.
 11144 00000B7F EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11145                                  
 11146                                  		; fall into harderr
 11147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11148                                  
 11149                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11150                                  
 11151                                  harderr:				
 11152 00000B81 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11153                                  harderr2:				
 11154 00000B84 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11155                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11156 00000B89 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11157 00000B8D 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11158                                  
 11159                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11160                                  
 11161                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11162                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11163 00000B91 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11164                                  
 11165                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11166                                  
 11167                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11168                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11169                                  
 11170                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11171                                  normspeed:
 11172 00000B94 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11173 00000B99 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11174 00000B9B 06                      		push	es
 11175 00000B9C 50                      		push	ax
 11176 00000B9D A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11177 00000BA0 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11178 00000BA4 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11179 00000BA8 58                      		pop	ax
 11180 00000BA9 07                      		pop	es
 11181 00000BAA E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11182 00000BAD 06                      		push	es
 11183 00000BAE C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11184 00000BB2 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11185                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11186 00000BB7 07                      		pop	es
 11187 00000BB8 C3                      		retn
 11188                                  
 11189                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11190                                  
 11191                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11192                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11193                                  
 11194                                  fastspeed:		
 11195 00000BB9 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11196                                  					; ftoobig
 11197 00000BBE 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11198 00000BC0 06                      		push	es
 11199 00000BC1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11200 00000BC5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11201 00000BC7 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11202 00000BCB 07                      		pop	es
 11203 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11205                                  
 11206                                  notready:				
 11207 00000BCD F9                      		stc
 11208 00000BCE B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11209 00000BD0 C3                      		retn
 11210                                  
 11211                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11212                                  
 11213                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11214                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11215                                  
 11216                                  maperror:	
 11217 00000BD1 51                      		push	cx
 11218 00000BD2 06                      		push	es
 11219 00000BD3 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11220 00000BD4 07                      		pop	es
 11221 00000BD5 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11222 00000BD7 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11223 00000BDA B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11224                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11225 00000BDD BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11226 00000BE0 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11227                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11228 00000BE2 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11229                                  					; get translation
 11230                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11231                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11232 00000BE5 07                      		pop	es
 11233 00000BE6 59                      		pop	cx
 11234 00000BE7 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11235 00000BE8 C3                      		retn
 11236                                  
 11237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11238                                  
 11239                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11240                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11241                                  
 11242                                  set_tim:		
 11243 00000BE9 50                      		push	ax
 11244 00000BEA E88DF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11245                                  
 11246                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11247                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11248                                  
 11249 00000BED 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11250 00000BF1 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11251 00000BF3 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11252                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11253                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11254 00000BF7 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11255                                  setaccess:				
 11256 00000BF9 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11257 00000BFE 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11258 00000C02 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11259                                  done_set:				
 11260 00000C06 F8                      		clc
 11261                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11262 00000C07 58                      		pop	ax
 11263 00000C08 C3                      		retn
 11264                                  
 11265                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11266                                  
 11267                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11268                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11269                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11270                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11271                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11272                                  
 11273                                  again:	
 11274 00000C09 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11275 00000C0C 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11276 00000C0F 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11277                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11278 00000C11 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11279 00000C12 C3                      		retn
 11280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11281                                  
 11282                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11283 00000C13 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11284 00000C15 C3                      		retn
 11285

 11295                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11296                                  ;
 11297                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11298                                  ;
 11299                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11300                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11301                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11302                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11303                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11304                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11305                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11306                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11307                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11308                                  
 11309                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11310                                  
 11311                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11312                                  
 11313                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11314 00000C16 00                      		db 0
 11315                                  
 11316                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11317                                  %if 0
 11318                                  
 11319                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11320                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11321                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11322                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11323                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11324                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11325                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11326                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11327                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11328                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11329                                  
 11330                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11331                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11332                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11333                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11334                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11335                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11336                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11337                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11338                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11339                                  
 11340                                  %endif
 11341                                  
 11342                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11343 00000C17 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11344 00000C18 [820C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11345 00000C1A [BD0E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11346 00000C1C [5D0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11347 00000C1E [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11348 00000C20 [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11349 00000C22 [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11350 00000C24 [5E11]                  		dw GetMediaId		; 66h
 11351 00000C26 [2A12]                  		dw GetAccessFlag	; 67h ; unpublished function
 11352 00000C28 [7C12]                  		dw SenseMediaType	; 68h
 11353                                  
 11354 00000C2A 08                      IoWriteJumpTable: db ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 7
 11355 00000C2B [CD0C]                  		dw SetDeviceParameters	; 40h
 11356 00000C2D [C40E]                  		dw WriteTrack		; 41h
 11357 00000C2F [980D]                  		dw FormatTrack		; 42h
 11358 00000C31 [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11359 00000C33 [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11360 00000C35 [7E0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 11361 00000C37 [9411]                  		dw SetMediaId		; 46h
 11362 00000C39 [4012]                  		dw SetAccessFlag	; 47h ; unpublished function
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11365                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11366                                  ;
 11367                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11368                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 11369                                  ; Added for 5.00
 11370                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11371                                  
 11372 00000C3B 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11373 00000C3C 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 11374 00000C3D 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 11375 00000C3E 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 11376 00000C3F 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 11377 00000C40 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 11378 00000C41 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 11379 00000C42 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 11380 00000C43 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11381 00000C44 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 11382 00000C45 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 11383

 11387                                  
 11388                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11389                                  
 11390                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11391                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11392                                  ;
 11393                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11394                                  ;
 11395                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11396                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11397                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11398                                  ;
 11399                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11400                                  
 11401                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11402                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11403                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11404 00000C46 E882F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11405 00000C49 06                      		push	es
 11406 00000C4A C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11407 00000C4E 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11408                                  					; RAWIO
 11409 00000C53 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11410 00000C57 07                      		pop	es
 11411 00000C58 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11412                                  
 11413                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11414                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11415                                  
 11416                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11417 00000C5A BE[170C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11418                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11419                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11420 00000C5D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11421 00000C5F 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11422                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11423 00000C61 BE[2A0C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11424                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11425                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11426                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11427 00000C64 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11428 00000C66 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11429 00000C68 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11430 00000C6B 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11431 00000C6D 98                      		cbw
 11432 00000C6E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11433 00000C70 46                      		inc	si
 11434 00000C71 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11435 00000C73 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11436                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11437 00000C76 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11438                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11439                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11440 00000C7B B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11441 00000C7D C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11442                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11443                                  
 11444                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11445                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11446                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11447 00000C7E 5A                      		pop	dx
 11448                                  
 11449                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11450 00000C7F E953F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11452                                  
 11453                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11454                                  
 11455                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11456                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11457                                  ;
 11458                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11459                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11460                                  ;
 11461                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11462                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11463                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11464                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11465                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11466                                  
 11467                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11468                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11469                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11470                                  
 11471 00000C82 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11472 00000C86 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11473                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11474 00000C89 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11475 00000C8D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11476 00000C90 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11477 00000C94 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11478                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11479 00000C97 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11480 00000C9A 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11481 00000C9E 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11482 00000CA1 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11483 00000CA3 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11484                                  					
 11485                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11486 00000CA6 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11487 00000CA9 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11488                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11489 00000CAC 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11490 00000CAE 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11491 00000CAF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11492                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11493                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11494                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data

 11676                                  
 11677                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11678                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11679                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11680                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11681                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11682                                  ;
 11683                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11684                                  ;
 11685                                  ; output:
 11686                                  ;	for status call:
 11687                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11688                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11689                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11690                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11691                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11692                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11693                                  ;
 11694                                  ;	for format track:
 11695                                  ;		carry set if error
 11696                                  ;
 11697                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11698                                  
 11699                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11700                                  
 11701                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11702                                  FormatTrack:

 11848                                  
 11849                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11850                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11851                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11852                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11853                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11854                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11855                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 11857                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 11881                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON

 11962                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11963                                  
 11964                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11965                                  
 11966                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11967                                  ;
 11968                                  ; TrackIo:
 11969                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11970                                  ;
 11971                                  ;   input:
 11972                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11973                                  ;		  3 = write
 11974                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11975                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11976                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11977                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11978                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11979                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11980                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11981                                  ;
 11982                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11983                                  
 11984                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11985                                  		
 11986                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11987                                  TrackIo:	
 11988                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11989 00000EF1 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error

 11998 00000F05 58                      		pop	ax

 12002 00000F0B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 12089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12090                                  ;
 12091                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12092                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12093                                  ; are permissible.
 12094                                  ;
 12095                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12096                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12097                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12103                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 12104 00000F75 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 12105 00000F77 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12106 00000F79 C3                      		retn
 12107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12108                                  
 12109                                  OneK:

 12111 00000F7C C3                      		retn

 12191                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive

 12198                                  
 12199                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12200                                  
 12201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12202                                  ;
 12203                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12204                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12205                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12206                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12207                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12208                                  ;
 12209                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12210                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12211                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12212                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12213                                  ;
 12214                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12215                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12216                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12217                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12218                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12219                                  ;
 12220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12221                                  
 12222                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12223                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12224 00000FE6 51                      		push	cx
 12225 00000FE7 52                      		push	dx
 12226                                  
 12227                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12228                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12229                                  
 12230 00000FE8 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12231 00000FED 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12232 00000FEF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12233 00000FF1 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12234 00000FF6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12235 00000FF8 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12236                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12237                                  
 12238                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12239 00000FFA 06                      		push	es
 12240 00000FFB 56                      		push	si
 12241 00000FFC 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12242 00001000 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12243                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12244                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12245 00001005 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12246 00001009 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12247                                  
 12248                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12249                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12250                                  
 12251 0000100D 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12252 00001012 5E                      		pop	si
 12253 00001013 07                      		pop	es
 12254                                  
 12255                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12256 00001014 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12257 00001018 49                      		dec	cx
 12258 00001019 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12259 0000101C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12260 0000101E D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12261 00001020 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12262 00001022 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12263 00001026 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12264 0000102A 06                      		push	es
 12265 0000102B 1E                      		push	ds
 12266 0000102C 56                      		push	si
 12267 0000102D 57                      		push	di
 12268 0000102E B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12269 00001030 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12270                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12271 00001032 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12272 00001034 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12273 00001039 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12274 0000103B 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12275 0000103C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12276 00001040 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12277                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12278                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12279 00001045 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12280 00001049 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12281 0000104D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12282                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12283 00001051 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12284                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12285 00001056 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12286 0000105B C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12293                                  
 12294                                  FormaStatErr:

 12309                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12311

 12314                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12315                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12316 00001074 48                      		dec	ax
 12317                                  		; al = 2				
 12318                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12319                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12320                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12321                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12322                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12323

 12339                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12340                                  
 12341                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12342                                  
 12343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12346                                  ;
 12347                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12348                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12349                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12350                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12351                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12352                                  ;
 12353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12354                                  
 12355                                  ResetDisk:	
 12356 0000107C 50                      		push	ax
 12357 0000107D 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12358                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12359 00001082 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12360                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12361 00001084 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12362                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12363 00001089 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12364 0000108B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12365                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12366 0000108D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12367                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12368 00001092 58                      		pop	ax
 12369 00001093 C3                      		retn

 12371                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12372                                  
 12373                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12374                                  
 12375                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12376                                  ;
 12377                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12378                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12379                                  ;
 12380                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12381                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12382                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12383                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12384                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12385                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12386                                  ;
 12387                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12388                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12389                                  ;
 12390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12391                                  
 12392                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12393                                  ToRom:	
 12394 00001094 53                      		push	bx
 12395 00001095 56                      		push	si
 12396                                  
 12397                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12398                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12399                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12400                                  
 12401 00001096 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12402 0000109B 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12403 0000109D 50                      		push	ax
 12404 0000109E 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12405 0000109F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12406                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12407 000010A4 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12408 000010A5 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12409                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12410 000010A9 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12411                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12412                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12413 000010AE 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12414 000010B2 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12415                                  		
 12416 000010B6 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12417 000010B9 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12418 000010BD A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12419 000010C0 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12420                                  					; Important for	format
 12421 000010C4 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12422                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12423                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12424 000010C9 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12425 000010CA 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12426 000010CC 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12427                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12428 000010D1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12429 000010D2 58                      		pop	ax
 12430                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12431 000010D3 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12432 000010D7 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12433 000010D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12434 000010DD 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12435 000010E1 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12436 000010E2 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12437 000010E6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12438 000010E8 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12439 000010E9 5E                      		pop	si
 12440 000010EA 5B                      		pop	bx
 12441 000010EB C3                      		retn

 12444                                  
 12445                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12446                                  
 12447                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12448                                  
 12449                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12450                                  ;
 12451                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12452                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12453                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12454                                  ;
 12455                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12456                                  
 12457                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12458                                  ioctl_getown:
 12459 000010EC E8DCF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12460 000010EF 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12461                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12462 000010F3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12463                                  ownloop:				
 12464 000010F7 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12465 000010FB 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12466                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12467 000010FD 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12468                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12469                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12470 00001102 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12471                                  getnextBDS:				
 12472 00001104 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12473 00001107 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12475                                  
 12476                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12477                                  ;
 12478                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12479                                  ; in al to al.
 12480                                  ;
 12481                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12482                                  
 12483                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12484                                  ioctl_setown:
 12485 00001109 E8BFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12486 0000110C C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12487                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12488 00001111 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12489 00001114 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12490                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12491                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12492                                  
 12493                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12494                                  ;
 12495                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12496                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12497                                  ;
 12498                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12499                                  
 12500                                  exitown:				
 12501 00001119 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12502                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12503 0000111B 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12504                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12505                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12506 00001120 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12507 00001122 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12508                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12509                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12510 00001126 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12511                                  exitnomult:				
 12512 00001128 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12513 0000112C 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12514                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12515                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12516                                  		; cf=0
 12517                                  		;clc
 12518 0000112F C3                      		retn

 12570                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12571                                  
 12572                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12573                                  ;	get media id
 12574                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12575                                  ;
 12576                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12577                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12578                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12579                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12580                                  ;
 12581                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12582                                  ;
 12583                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12584                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12585                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12586                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12587                                  ;
 12588                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12589                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12590                                  ;
 12591                                  ; LOGIC:
 12592                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12593                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12594                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12595                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12596                                  ;
 12597                                  ; {
 12598                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12599                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12600                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12601                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12602                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12603                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12604                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12605                                  ;		};
 12606                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12607                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12608                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12609                                  ;		};
 12610                                  ;	else
 12611                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12612                                  ;
 12613                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12614                                  
 12615                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12616                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12617                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12618                                  
 12619                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12620                                  GetMediaId:
 12621 0000115E E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12622 00001161 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12623 00001165 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12624 0000116A E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12625 0000116D 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12626                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12627 0000116F 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12628                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12629 00001174 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12630                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12631 00001176 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12632 00001179 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12633                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12634                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12635 0000117C 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12636 0000117E C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12637 00001182 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12638                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12639 00001186 46                      		inc	si
 12640                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12641                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12642 00001187 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12643 0000118A B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12644                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12645                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12646 0000118D F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12647                                  	
 12648                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12649                                  		; cf = 0
 12650                                  		;clc
 12651                                  
 12652 0000118F C3                      		retn
 12653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12654                                  
 12655                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12656 00001190 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12657 00001192 F9                      		stc
 12658                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12659 00001193 C3                      		retn
 12660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12661                                  
 12662                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12663                                  
 12664                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12665                                  ;  set media id
 12666                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12667                                  
 12668                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12669                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12670                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12671                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12672                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12673                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12674                                  ;
 12675                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12676                                  ;
 12677                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12678                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12679                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12680                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12681                                  ;
 12682                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12683                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12684                                  ;
 12685                                  ; logic:
 12686                                  ;
 12687                                  ; {
 12688                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12689                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12690                                  ;	BootIo;
 12691                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12692                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12693                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12694                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12695                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12696                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12697                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12698                                  ;		};
 12699                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12700                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12701                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12702                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12703                                  ;		};
 12704                                  ;	else
 12705                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12706                                  ;
 12707                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12708                                  
 12709                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12710                                  SetMediaId:
 12711 00001194 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12712 00001197 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12713                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12714 0000119B 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12715 0000119D C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12716 000011A2 52                      		push	dx
 12717 000011A3 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12718 000011A6 5A                      		pop	dx
 12719 000011A7 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12720                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12721 000011A9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12722                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12723 000011AE 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12724 000011B0 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12725                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12726 000011B5 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12727 000011B7 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12728 000011B8 57                      		push	di
 12729 000011B9 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12730 000011BA 07                      		pop	es
 12731 000011BB BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12732 000011BE C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12733 000011C2 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12734 000011C5 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12735 000011C8 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12736                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12737                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12738 000011CB F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12739 000011CD 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12740 000011CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 12741 000011CF 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12742 000011D0 07                      		pop	es
 12743 000011D1 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12744 000011D4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12745 000011D6 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12746 000011DB E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12747 000011DE C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12748                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12749                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12750 000011E3 C3                      		retn
 12751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12752                                  
 12753                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12754 000011E4 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12755 000011E6 F9                      		stc
 12756                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12757 000011E7 C3                      		retn
 12758                                  
 12759                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12760                                  
 12761                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12762                                  
 12763                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12764                                  ;	BootIo
 12765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12766                                  ;
 12767                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12768                                  ;
 12769                                  ; input :
 12770                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12771                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12772                                  ;
 12773                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12774                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12775                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12776                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12777                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12778                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12779                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12780                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12783                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12784                                  ;
 12785                                  ; logic:
 12786                                  ;
 12787                                  ; {
 12788                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12789                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12790                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12791                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12792                                  ; }
 12793                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12794                                  
 12795                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12796                                  BootIo:	
 12797 000011E8 06                      		push	es
 12798 000011E9 57                      		push	di
 12799 000011EA 53                      		push	bx
 12800 000011EB 1E                      		push	ds
 12801 000011EC 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12802                                  
 12803                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12804                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12805                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12806                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12807                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12808                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12809                                  
 12810 000011ED BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12811 000011F0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12812 000011F2 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12813 000011F6 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12814 000011F9 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12815 000011FC 5B                      		pop	bx
 12816 000011FD 5F                      		pop	di
 12817 000011FE 07                      		pop	es
 12818 000011FF C3                      		retn
 12819
