 12823                                  
 12824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12825                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12827                                  ;
 12828                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12829                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12830                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12831                                  ; history in the flags.
 12832                                  ;
 12833                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12834                                  ;
 12835                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12836                                  ;
 12837                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12838                                  ;
 12839                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12840                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12841                                  ;
 12842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12843                                  
 12844                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12845 00001200 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12846 00001204 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12847 00001206 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12848                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12849 00001208 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12850                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12851                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12852 0000120D 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12853 0000120F 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12854 00001214 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12855 00001216 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12856 00001219 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12857                                  
 12858                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12859                                  
 12860 0000121B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12861 0000121D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12862                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12863                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12864 0000121F 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12865 00001221 53                      		push	bx
 12866 00001222 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12867                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12868                                  					; physical drive
 12869 00001225 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12870 00001228 5B                      		pop	bx
 12871                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12872 00001229 C3                      		retn
 12873                                  
 12874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12875                                  
 12876                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12877                                  
 12878                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12879                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12880                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12881                                  ;
 12882                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12883                                  ;
 12884                                  ; INPUT :
 12885                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12886                                  ;
 12887                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12888                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12889                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12890                                  
 12891                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12892                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12893 0000122A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12894 0000122E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12895                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12896                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12897 00001231 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12898                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12899 00001233 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12900                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12901                                  					; unformatted_media
 12902 00001238 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12903 0000123A FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12904                                  
 12905                                  GafDone:				
 12906 0000123C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12907 0000123F C3                      		retn
 12908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12909                                  
 12910                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12911                                  
 12912                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12913                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12914                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12917                                  ;
 12918                                  ; input :
 12919                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12920                                  ;
 12921                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12922                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12923                                  
 12924                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12925                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12926 00001240 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12927 00001244 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12928                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12929 00001247 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12930                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12931                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12932 0000124C 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12933 00001250 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12934                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12935 00001252 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12936                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12937                                  					; unformatted_media
 12938                                  saf_Done:				
 12939 00001257 C3                      		retn
 12940                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12941                                  
 12942                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12943                                  
 12944                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12945                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12946                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12947                                  ;
 12948                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12949                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12950                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12951                                  ;
 12952                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12953                                  
 12954                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12955                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12956 00001258 06                      		push	es
 12957 00001259 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12958 0000125D 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12959                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12960 00001261 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12961                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12962 00001263 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12963 00001265 0E                      		push	cs
 12964 00001266 07                      		pop	es
 12965 00001267 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12966                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12967 0000126A BF[3B0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12968                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12969                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12970 0000126D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12971 0000126F F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12972 00001271 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12973 00001273 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12974                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12975                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12976                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12977                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12978                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12979                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12980                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12981 00001276 07                      		pop	es
 12982                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12983                                  		; cf = 0
 12984                                  		;clc
 12985 00001277 C3                      		retn
 12986                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12987                                  nosupport:				
 12988 00001278 07                      		pop	es
 12989 00001279 E959EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12990                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12991                                  
 12992                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12993                                  
 12994                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12995                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12996                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12997                                  ;
 12998                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12999                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13000                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13001                                  ;	    drive)
 13002                                  ;
 13003                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13004                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13005                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13006                                  ;
 13007                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13008                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13009                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13010                                  ;
 13011                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13012                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13013                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13014                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13015                                  ;
 13016                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13017                                  ;
 13018                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13019                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13020                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13021                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13022                                  ; 
 13023                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13024                                  
 13025                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13026                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13027 0000127C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13028 00001280 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13029                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13030                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13031 00001283 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13032 00001285 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13033                                  		;
 13034 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13035                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13036                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13037                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13038 0000128B B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13039                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13040 0000128D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13041 0000128F 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13042 00001291 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13043                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13044 00001293 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13045 00001295 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13046 00001297 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13047 00001299 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13048 0000129B 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13049 0000129D 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13050 0000129F 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13051 000012A1 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13052                                  GotMediaType:				
 13053 000012A3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13054                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13055                                  		; cf = 0
 13056                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13057 000012A6 C3                      		retn
 13058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13059                                  
 13060                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13061 000012A7 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13062 000012AA 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13063 000012AC B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13064 000012AE 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13065 000012B1 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13066                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13067 000012B3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13068                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13069 000012B5 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13070 000012B7 F9                      		stc
 13071 000012B8 C3                      		retn
 13072                                  
 13073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13074                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13075                                  		;db    0
 13076                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13077                                  
 13078                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13079                                  
 13080                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13081                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13082                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13083                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13084                                  
 13085                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13086                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13087                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13088                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13089                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13090                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13091                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13092                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13093                                  ;
 13094                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13095                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13096                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13097                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13098                                  ;
 13099                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13100                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13101                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13102                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13103                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13104                                  ;
 13105                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13106                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13107                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13108                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13109                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13110                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13111                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13112                                  
 13113                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13114                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13115                                  
 13116                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13117                                  
 13118                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13119 000012B9 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13120 000012BC 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13121 000012BE 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13122 000012C1 743B                    		jz	short mine
 13123                                  
 13124                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13125                                  
 13126 000012C3 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13127 000012C6 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 13128 000012C8 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13129 000012CB 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13130 000012CD E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13131                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13132                                  
 13133                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13134 000012D0 CF                      		iret
 13135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13136                                  
 13137                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13138 000012D1 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13139 000012D2 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13140                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13141                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13142                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13143 000012D4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13144                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13145                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13146                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13147                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13148                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13149 000012D9 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 13150 000012DD FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13151 000012E1 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 13152 000012E5 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13153                                  
 13154                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13155                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13156                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13157                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13158 000012E9 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 13159 000012ED A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13160 000012F0 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 13161 000012F4 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13162                                  
 13163 000012F8 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13164 000012F9 5B                      		pop	bx
 13165 000012FA 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13166 000012FB 5A                      		pop	dx
 13167 000012FC 58                      		pop	ax
 13168                                  i2f_iret:				
 13169 000012FD CF                      		iret
 13170                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13171                                  
 13172                                  mine:					
 13173 000012FE 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13174 00001300 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13175 00001302 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13176 00001304 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13177 00001306 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13178 00001308 EBF3                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 13179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13180                                  
 13181                                  disp_func:				
 13182 0000130A 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13183 0000130C 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13184 0000130E 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13185 00001310 7424                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13186                                  
 13187                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13188                                  
 13189 00001312 1E                      		push	ds
 13190 00001313 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13191                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13192                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13193                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13194                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13195                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13196 00001318 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13197 0000131C 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13198 00001320 1F                      		pop	ds
 13199                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13200                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13201                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13202 00001321 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13203                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13204                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13205                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13206                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13207                                  
 13208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13209                                  
 13210                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13211 00001326 06                      		push	es
 13212 00001327 1E                      		push	ds
 13213 00001328 1E                      		push	ds
 13214 00001329 07                      		pop	es
 13215                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13216 0000132A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 13217                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13218                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13219 0000132F E8C303                  		call	install_bds
 13220 00001332 1F                      		pop	ds
 13221 00001333 07                      		pop	es
 13222 00001334 EBC7                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 13223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13224                                  
 13225                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13226                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13227 00001336 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13228                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13229 0000133B C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13230                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13231                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022				
 13232 0000133F EBBC                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 13233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13234                                  
 13235                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13236                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13237                                  
 13238                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13239                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13240                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13241                                  
 13242                                  win386call:				
 13243 00001341 1E                      		push	ds
 13244 00001342 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13245                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13246                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13247 00001347 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13248                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13249 00001349 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13250 0000134B 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13251                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13252 0000134D 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13253                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13254 0000134F F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13255                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13256 00001352 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13257                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13258 00001354 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13259 00001359 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13260                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13261                                  
 13262                                  Win386Init:	
 13263                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13264 0000135B F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 13265                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13266 0000135E 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13267                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13268 00001360 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13269                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13270                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13271 00001365 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13272 00001369 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13273                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13274 0000136D BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13275 00001370 1E                      		push	ds
 13276 00001371 07                      		pop	es
 13277                                  win_iret:				
 13278 00001372 1F                      		pop	ds
 13279                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 13280 00001373 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13282                                  
 13283                                  handle_multmult:			
 13284 00001375 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13285 00001377 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13286 00001379 1E                      		push	ds
 13287 0000137A E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13288                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13289                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13290                                  		;dec	bx
 13291 0000137D BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13292 00001380 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13293 00001382 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13294 00001384 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13295 00001386 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13296 00001388 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13297 0000138A 43                      		inc	bx
 13298                                  try_1:					
 13299 0000138B 1F                      		pop	ds
 13300 0000138C EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13301                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13302                                  
 13303                                  try_2:					
 13304 0000138E 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13305 00001390 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13306 00001392 1E                      		push	ds
 13307                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13308                                  		;xor	di, di
 13309                                  		;dec	di
 13310 00001393 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13311 00001396 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13312 00001398 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13313 0000139B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13314 0000139E 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13315 000013A0 F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13316 000013A2 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13317 000013A4 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13318                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13319                                  		;sub	di, di
 13320                                  		;dec	di
 13321 000013A6 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13322 000013A9 EB16                    		jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13323                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13324                                  
 13325                                  try_4:					
 13326                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13327 000013AB 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13328 000013AF 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13329                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13330                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13331 000013B2 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13332                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13333 000013B5 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13334 000013B9 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 13335 000013BB C706[F508]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 13336                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 13337                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 13338                                  InsuffHMA:				
 13339 000013C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13340                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13341                                  try_3:		
 13342 000013C2 EBAF                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13344                                  
 13345                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13346                                  ;try_3:					
 13347                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
