 14388                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14389                                  
 14390                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14392                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14394                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14395                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14396                                  
 14397                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14398 0000176F 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14399 00001771 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14399 0000177A 736B6574746520666F-
 14399 00001783 7220647269766520   
 14400                                  
 14401                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14402 0000178B 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14402 00001794 65737320616E79206B-
 14402 0000179D 6579207768656E2072-
 14402 000017A6 656164790D0A       
 14403 000017AC 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14406                                  
 14407                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14408                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14409                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14410                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14412                                  
 14413                                  chkopcnt:		
 14414 000017AE 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14415 000017B3 C3                      		retn
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14418                                  
 14419                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14420                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14421                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14422                                  ;
 14423                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14424                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14425                                  
 14426                                  mediacheck:	
 14427 000017B4 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14428 000017B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14429 000017B9 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14430 000017BC 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14431 000017BE E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14432 000017C1 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14433 000017C3 50                      		push	ax
 14434 000017C4 52                      		push	dx
 14435 000017C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14436                                  					; set logical drive number
 14437 000017C9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14438 000017CB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14439                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14440                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14441 000017CD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14442 000017CE 58                      		pop	ax
 14443 000017CF 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14444 000017D1 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14445                                  
 14446                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14447                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14448                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14449                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14450                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14451                                  ; status.
 14452                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14453 000017D4 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14454 000017D8 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14455                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14456                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14457                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14458                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14459 000017DC 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14460                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14461                                  
 14462                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14463                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14464                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14465                                  
 14466 000017DE 50                      		push	ax
 14467 000017DF 51                      		push	cx
 14468 000017E0 52                      		push	dx
 14469 000017E1 E86FED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14470 000017E4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14471 000017E5 59                      		pop	cx
 14472 000017E6 58                      		pop	ax
 14473 000017E7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14474 000017E9 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14475                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14476 000017EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14477                                  mediaret:				
 14478 000017ED C3                      		retn
 14479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14480                                  
 14481                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14482                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14483                                  ; or write.
 14484                                  
 14485                                  mediadovolid:				
 14486 000017EE E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14487 000017F1 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14488 000017F3 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14489 000017F6 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14490 000017F8 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14492                                  
 14493                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14494                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14495                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14496                                  ; dos.
 14497                                  ;
 14498                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14499                                  
 14500                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14501                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14502                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14503                                  
 14504                                  checklatchio:	
 14505                                  
 14506                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14507                                  			
 14508 000017FB E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14509 000017FE 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14510                                  
 14511                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14512                                  
 14513 00001800 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14514 00001803 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14517                                  ; expensive verification.
 14518                                  
 14519 00001805 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14520 00001808 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14521 0000180A E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14522 0000180D 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14523 0000180F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14524 00001811 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14525 00001813 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14526                                  checklatchret:				
 14527 00001816 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14528                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14529 00001819 F9                      		stc
 14530 0000181A 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14531                                  checkret:				
 14532 0000181B C3                      		retn
 14533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14534                                  
 14535                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14536                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14537                                  ;
 14538                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14539                                  
 14540                                  checkfatvid:				
 14541 0000181C E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14542 0000181F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14543 00001821 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14544                                  
 14545                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14546                                  
 14547                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14548                                  
 14549                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14550                                  
 14551                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14552                                  ;
 14553                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14554                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14555                                  ;
 14556                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14557                                  ;
 14558                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14559                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14560                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14561                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14562                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14565                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14566                                  ; routine.)
 14567                                  ;
 14568                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14569                                  
 14570                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14571                                  check_vid:
 14572                                  
 14573                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14574                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14575                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14576                                  
 14577 00001823 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14578                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14579                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14580 00001828 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14581 0000182A E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14582 0000182D 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14583 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14584 00001831 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14585                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14586 00001836 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14587                                  					; if not fat system
 14588 00001838 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14589 0000183B 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14590 0000183D E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14591 00001840 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14592                                  					; definitely changed
 14593 00001843 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14594                                  
 14595 00001845 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14596                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14597 00001846 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14598                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14599                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14600                                  		;clc
 14601                                  checkfatret:				
 14602 00001849 C3                      		retn
 14603                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14604                                  
 14605                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14606                                  changed_drv:
 14607 0000184A F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14608 0000184B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14609                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14610 00001850 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14612                                  
 14613                                  ; extended id check
 14614                                  
 14615                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14616                                  
 14617                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14618                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14619                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14620                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14621                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14622                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14623                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14624                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14625                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14626                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14627                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14628                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14629                                  ;
 14630                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14631                                  
 14632                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14633                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14634 00001851 50                      		push	ax
 14635                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14636                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14637 00001852 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14638 00001855 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14639 00001859 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14640 0000185B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14641 0000185E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14642 00001862 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14643 00001864 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14644                                  					; don't know
 14645 00001866 58                      		pop	ax
 14646 00001867 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14647                                  					; reset the flag
 14648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14649                                  
 14650                                  ext_changed:				
 14651 00001869 58                      		pop	ax
 14652 0000186A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14653                                  					; disk changed!
 14654                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14655                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14656                                  		;clc
 14657 0000186D EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14658                                  
 14659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14660                                  
 14661                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14662                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14663                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14664                                  ;
 14665                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14666                                  
 14667                                  checkio:				
 14668 0000186F 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14669 00001872 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14670 00001874 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14671 00001877 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14672 00001879 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14673 0000187C 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14674 0000187E E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14675 00001881 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14676 00001883 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14677 00001885 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14678 00001887 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14679 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14681                                  
 14682                                  checkioerr:				
 14683 00001889 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14684                                  
 14685                                  checkioret:				
 14686 0000188C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14687 0000188D E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14689                                  
 14690                                  no_error_map:				
 14691 00001890 E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14692                                  
 14693                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14694                                  
 14695                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14696                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14697                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14698                                  
 14699                                  returnvid:		
 14700 00001893 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14701                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14702 00001896 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14703 00001899 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14704 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14705 0000189C C3                      		retn
 14706                                  
 14707                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14708                                  
 14709                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14710                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14711                                  ;
 14712                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14713                                  ; **trashes si**
 14714                                  
 14715                                  media_set_vid:				
 14716 0000189D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14717                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14718                                  
 14719                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14720                                  
 14721                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14722                                  
 14723                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14724                                  
 14725                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14726                                  vid_into_packet:
 14727 000018A0 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14728 000018A1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14729 000018A5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14730 000018A8 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14731 000018AA 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14732 000018AD 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14733 000018B0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14734                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14735 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 14736                                  
 14737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14738                                  
 14739                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14740                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14741                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14742                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14743                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14744                                  ;
 14745                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14746                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14747                                  ;
 14748                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14749                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14750                                  ;		carry set
 14751                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14752                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14753                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14754                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14755                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14756                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14757                                  ;
 14758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14759                                  
 14760                                  hidensity:
 14761                                  
 14762                                  ; check for correct drive
 14763                                  		
 14764                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14765 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14766                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14767                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14768 000018B7 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14769                                  
 14770                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14771                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14772                                  
 14773 000018B9 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14774 000018BE 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14775                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14776                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14777 000018C0 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14778 000018C3 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14779                                  
 14780                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14781                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14782                                  
 14783 000018C5 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14784                                  					; ffOther
 14785 000018CA 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14786 000018CC 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14787                                  					; ff288
 14788 000018D1 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14789 000018D3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14790 000018D5 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14791                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14792                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14793 000018D8 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14794                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14795                                  					; 2 sides
 14796 000018DB BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14797                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14798                                  					; & head max
 14799 000018DE 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14800 000018E1 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14801                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14802                                  
 14803                                  Is720K:					
 14804 000018E4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14805 000018E7 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14807                                  
 14808                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14809                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14810                                  		;retn
 14811                                  
 14812                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14813                                  
 14814                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14815                                  
 14816                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14817                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14818                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14819                                  ;
 14820                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14821                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14822                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14823                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14824                                  ;
 14825                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14826                                  ;
 14827                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14828                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14829                                  
 14830                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14831 000018EA 06                      		push	es
 14832 000018EB 57                      		push	di
 14833                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14834                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14835 000018EC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14838                                  
 14839                                  scan_bds:				
 14840 000018F0 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14841 000018F4 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14842                                  
 14843                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14844                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14845                                  
 14846 000018F6 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14847                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14848                                  get_next_bds:				
 14849 000018FA 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14850                                  					; go to	next bds
 14851 000018FD 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14852 00001900 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14853 00001902 5F                      		pop	di
 14854 00001903 07                      		pop	es
 14855 00001904 C3                      		retn
 14856                                  
 14857                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14858                                  
 14859                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14860                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14861                                  ;
 14862                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14863                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14864                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14865                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14866                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14867                                  
 14868                                  checkromchange:	
 14869                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14870                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14871 00001905 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14872                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14873                                  					; fchanged
 14874 0000190A C3                      		retn
 14875                                  
 14876                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14877                                  
 14878                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14879                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14880                                  ;
 14881                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14882                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14883                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14884                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14885                                  
 14886                                  resetchanged:	
 14887                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14888                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14889 0000190B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14890                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14891                                  					; ~fchanged
 14892 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14893                                  
 14894                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14895                                  
 14896                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14897                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14898                                  ;
 14899                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14900                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14901                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14902                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14903                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14904                                  
 14905                                  haschange:
 14906                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14907                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14908 00001911 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14909                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14910                                  					; fchangeline
 14911 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14912                                  
 14913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14914                                  
 14915                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14916                                  
 14917                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14918                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14919                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14920                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14921                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14922                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14923                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14924                                  
 14925                                  ; set_volume_id
 14926                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14927                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14928                                  ;
 14929                                  ;   on entry:
 14930                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14931                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14932                                  ;
 14933                                  ;   on exit:
 14934                                  ;	carry clear:
 14935                                  ;	   successful call
 14936                                  ;	carry set
 14937                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14938                                  
 14939                                  set_volume_id:				
 14940 00001917 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14941 00001918 50                      		push	ax
 14942 00001919 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14943 0000191C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14944 0000191E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14945 00001921 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14946 00001923 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14947 00001926 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14948                                  setvret:				
 14949                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14950                                  		; cf = 0
 14951                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14952 00001929 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14953 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14954 0000192B C3                      		retn
 14955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14956                                  
 14957                                  seterr:					
 14958 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14959 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14960 0000192E C3                      		retn
 14961                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14962 0000192F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14963                                  
 14964                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14965                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14966                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14967                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14968                                  
 14969                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14970                                  
 14971                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14972                                  
 14973                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14974                                  ;
 14975                                  ;   on entry:
 14976                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14977                                  ;
 14978                                  ;   on exit:
 14979                                  ;	carry clear
 14980                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14981                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14982                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14983                                  ;
 14984                                  ;	carry set:
 14985                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14986                                  
 14987                                  read_volume_id:
 14988 00001931 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14989 00001932 51                      		push	cx
 14990 00001933 53                      		push	bx
 14991 00001934 50                      		push	ax
 14992 00001935 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14993 00001936 57                      		push	di
 14994 00001937 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14995 00001938 07                      		pop	es
 14996 00001939 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14997 0000193C BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14998 0000193F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14999 00001942 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15000 00001944 5F                      		pop	di
 15001 00001945 07                      		pop	es
 15002 00001946 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15003                                  					; # of fats
 15004 0000194A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15005                                  					; sectors / fat
 15006 0000194E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15007 00001950 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15008                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15009                                  					;
 15010                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15011                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15012 00001954 2EA3[2F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15013                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15014                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15015 00001958 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15016                                  					; # root dir entries
 15017 0000195C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15018 0000195E D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15019 00001960 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15020                                  next_sec:				
 15021 00001962 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15022 00001963 2EA1[2F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15023                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15024                                  					; get sector #
 15025 00001967 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15026                                  					; sectors / track
 15027 0000196B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15028 0000196D F7F1                    		div	cx
 15029                                  
 15030                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15031                                  
 15032 0000196F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15033                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15034 00001970 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15035 00001972 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15036 00001974 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15037                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15038 00001978 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15039 0000197A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15040 0000197C E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15041                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15042 0000197F 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 15043 00001981 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15044 00001984 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15045                                  fvid_loop:				
 15046 00001986 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15047 00001989 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15048 0000198B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15049 0000198E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15050 00001990 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15051 00001993 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15052                                  ent_loop:				
 15053 00001995 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15054 00001998 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15055 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15056 0000199B 2EFF06[2F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15057                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15058                                  					; next sector
 15059 000019A0 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15060                                  notfound:				
 15061 000019A2 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15062 000019A4 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15063                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15064                                  
 15065                                  found_vid:				
 15066 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15067 000019A7 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15068 000019A9 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15069 000019AA 57                      		push	di
 15070 000019AB 1E                      		push	ds
 15071 000019AC 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15072 000019AD BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15073 000019B0 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15074                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15075 000019B3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15076 000019B5 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 15077 000019B7 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15078 000019B8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15079 000019BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15080 000019BB 07                      		pop	es
 15081                                  fvid_ret:				
 15082 000019BC 58                      		pop	ax
 15083                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15084                                  		; cf = 0
 15085                                  		;clc
 15086                                  rvidret:				
 15087 000019BD 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15088 000019BE 59                      		pop	cx
 15089 000019BF 5A                      		pop	dx
 15090 000019C0 C3                      		retn
 15091                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15092                                  
 15093                                  no_vid:					
 15094 000019C1 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15095 000019C2 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15097                                  
 15098                                  readviderr:				
 15099 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15100 000019C5 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15101 000019C6 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15102                                  
 15103                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15104                                  
 15105                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15106                                  ;
 15107                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15108                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15109                                  
 15110                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 15111 000019C8 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15112 000019C9 56                      		push	si
 15113 000019CA 51                      		push	cx
 15114 000019CB BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15115                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15116 000019CE 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15117                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15118 000019D1 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15119 000019D4 FC                      		cld
 15120 000019D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15121 000019D7 59                      		pop	cx
 15122 000019D8 5E                      		pop	si
 15123 000019D9 5F                      		pop	di
 15124 000019DA C3                      		retn
 15125                                  
 15126                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15127                                  
 15128                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15129                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15130                                  ;
 15131                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15132                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15133                                  
 15134                                  check_volume_id:	
 15135 000019DB 57                      		push	di
 15136 000019DC 51                      		push	cx
 15137 000019DD BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15138                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 15139 000019E0 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15140                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15141 000019E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15142 000019E6 FC                      		cld
 15143 000019E7 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15144 000019E9 59                      		pop	cx
 15145 000019EA 5F                      		pop	di
 15146 000019EB C3                      		retn
 15147                                  
 15148                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15149                                  
 15150                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15151                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15152                                  ;
 15153                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15154                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15155                                  ;
 15156                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15157                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15158                                  ;
 15159                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15160                                  
 15161                                  fat_check:		
 15162 000019EC 50                      		push	ax
 15163 000019ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15164 000019EF A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15165 000019F2 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15166                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15167 000019F6 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15168 000019F8 4E                      		dec	si
 15169                                  okret1:					
 15170 000019F9 58                      		pop	ax
 15171 000019FA C3                      		retn
 15172                                  
 15173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15174                                  
 15175                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15176                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15177                                  
 15178                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15179                                  
 15180                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15181                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15182                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15183                                  
 15184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15185                                  
 15186                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15187                                  		;db 0
 15188                                  
 15189                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15190                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15191                                  
 15192                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15193 000019FB 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15194                                  %endif
 15195                                  
 15196                                  ;align 16
 15197                                  
 15198                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15199                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15200                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15201                                  BCODEEND:
 15202                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15203                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15204                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15205                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15206                                  
 15207                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 15208                                  
 15209                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15210                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 15211                                  ; ============================================================================
 15212                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 15219                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT
