 30013                                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 30014                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30015                                  	jne	short cu10
 30016                                  	inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 30017                                  cu10:	
 30018                                  	retn
 30019                                  
 30020                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30021                                  ;*** setUMBs - links umbs and sets allocation strategy for a load
 30022                                  ;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 30023                                  ; of the usual HIGH_FIRST.  See the code.
 30024                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30025                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30026                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30027                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30028                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_umb, fm_strat
 30029                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30030                                  
 30031                                  setUMBs:
 30032                                  	push	ax
 30033                                  	push	bx
 30034                                  	call	fm_link
 30035                                  	pop	bx
 30036                                  	pop	ax
 30037                                  	retn
 30038                                  
 30039                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30040                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 30041                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30042                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30043                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 30044                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 30045                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30046                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30047                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30048                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 30049                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0.  That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 30050                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 30051                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 30052                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30053                                  
 30054                                  loadLow:
 30055                                  	;push	ds
 30056                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 30057                                  	;pop	ds	
 30058                                  
 30059                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 30060                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30061                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 30062                                  	jne	short ll10
 30063                                  
 30064                                  	stc
 30065                                  ll15:
 30066                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 30067                                  	;stc
 30068                                  	;jmp	short llX
 30069                                  	retn
 30070                                  ll10:	
 30071                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 30072                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 30073                                  
 30074                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30075                                  	retn
 30076                                  
 30077                                  	;mov	al,1
 30078                                  	;clc
 30079                                  ;llX:
 30080                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 30081                                  	;retn
 30082                                  
 30083                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30084                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 30085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30086                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30087                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30088                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30089                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 30090                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30091                                  
 30092                                  HideUMBs:
 30093                                  	push	ax
 30094                                  	push	cx
 30095                                  	push	ds
 30096                                  	push	es
 30097                                  
 30098                                  	call	UmbTest		; See if we REALLY linked in anything...
 30099                                  	jc	short husX	; ...if not, there's nothing for us to do.
 30100                                  
 30101                                  	call	FixMem		; Concatenate adjacent free MCBs in upper mem
 30102                                  	call	setUMBs		; Link UMBs and set memory-allocation strategy
 30103                                  
 30104                                  	;putdata fInHigh,1	; Remember that we're now running high
 30105                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],1
 30106                                  
 30107                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; See if they gave us a list to leave free
 30108                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30109                                  
 30110                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED	; If they didn't,
 30111                                  	je	short husX	; then we shouldn't do this loop:
 30112                                  
 30113                                  	xor	cx,cx
 30114                                  
 30115                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30116                                  ; HUS10-CX - UMB number (after inc, 1==first UMB)
 30117                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 30118                                  
 30119                                  hus10:	inc	cx		; For each UMB:
 30120                                  	cmp	cx,MAXUMB ; 16
 30121                                  	jae	short hus20
 30122                                  
 30123                                  	mov	al,cl		; (stopping as soon as we're outside of the
 30124                                  	push	es
 30125                                  	call	findUMB		; valid range of UMBs)
 30126                                  	pop	es		; push/pop: trash what findumb finds.  :-)
 30127                                  	jc	short hus20
 30128                                  
 30129                                  	call	_hideUMB_	; hide what we need to hide.
 30130                                  
 30131                                  	jmp	short hus10
 30132                                  hus20:	
 30133                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; Now check if they offered /L:0
 30134                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 30135                                  
 30136                                  	or	al,al		; --Is the load UMB 0? (-1==unspecified)
 30137                                  	jnz	short husX	; If not, we're done.
 30138                                  
 30139                                  	call	hl_unlink	; If so, however, fix UMBs and strategy.
 30140                                  husX:	
 30141                                  	pop	es
 30142                                  	pop	ds
 30143                                  	pop	cx
 30144                                  	pop	ax
 30145                                  	retn
 30146                                  
 30147                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30148                                  ;*** GetLoadUMB - Returns the load UMB number in AL (-1 if not specified)
 30149                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30150                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30151                                  ; EXIT:   AL == load UMB
 30152                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30153                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30154                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30155                                  
 30156                                  ;GetLoadUMB:
 30157                                  ;	;getdata al, UmbLoad
 30158                                  ;	push	ds
 30159                                  ;	push	cs
 30160                                  ;	pop	ds
 30161                                  ;	mov	al,[UmLoad]
 30162                                  ;	pop	ds
 30163                                  ;	retn
 30164                                  
 30165                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30166                                  ;*** GetLoadSize - Returns the load UMB minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30167                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30168                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 30169                                  ; EXIT:   AX == load UMB minimum size
 30170                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30171                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30172                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30173                                  
 30174                                  GetLoadSize:
 30175                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30176                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30177                                  	jmp	short GetSize
 30178                                  
 30179                                  	;push	bx
 30180                                  	;;push	si
 30181                                  	;push	ds
 30182                                  	;push	cs
 30183                                  	;pop	ds
 30184                                  
 30185                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 30186                                  
 30187                                  	;xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30188                                  	;mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30189                                  	;shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30190                                  	;;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30191                                  	;;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30192                                  
 30193                                  	;;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30194                                  
 30195                                  	;add	bx,ax
 30196                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30197                                  
 30198                                  	;pop	ds
 30199                                  	;;pop	si
 30200                                  	;pop	bx
 30201                                  	;retn
 30202                                  
 30203                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30204                                  ;*** GetSize - Returns the UMB in AL's minimum size (0 if not specified)
 30205                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30206                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == a UMB number
 30207                                  ; EXIT:   AX == UMB minimum size, as specified by the user
 30208                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30209                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30210                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30211                                  
 30212                                  GetSize:
 30213                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30214                                  
 30215                                  	push	bx
 30216                                  	;push	si
 30217                                  	;push	ds
 30218                                  	;push	cs
 30219                                  	;pop	ds
 30220                                  
 30221                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 30222                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 30223                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 30224                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 30225                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 30226                                  
 30227                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 30228                                  
 30229                                  	add	bx,ax
 30230                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 30231                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 30232                                  
 30233                                  	;pop	ds
 30234                                  	;pop	si
 30235                                  	pop	bx
 30236                                  	retn
 30237                                  
 30238                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30239                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 30240                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30241                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 30242                                  ; EXIT:    None
 30243                                  ; ERROR:   None
 30244                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 30245                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30246                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 30247                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 30248                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30249                                  
 30250                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 30251                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 30252                                  ;	push	es
 30253                                  ;	push	cs
 30254                                  ;	pop	es
 30255                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 30256                                  ;	pop	es
 30257                                  ;	retn
 30258                                  
 30259                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30260                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 30261                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30262                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 30263                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30264                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30265                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30266                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30267                                  
 30268                                  StoLoadSize:
 30269                                  	push	dx
 30270                                  
 30271                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 30272                                  	;
 30273                                  	;push	ds
 30274                                  	;push	cs
 30275                                  	;pop	ds
 30276                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 30277                                  	;pop	ds	
 30278                                  
 30279                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30280                                  
 30281                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 30282                                  	je	short sls10
 30283                                  
 30284                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 30285                                  sls10:	
 30286                                  	pop	dx
 30287                                  	retn
 30288                                  
 30289                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30290                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 30291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30292                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 30293                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 30294                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30295                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30296                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30297                                  
 30298                                  hideUMB:
 30299                                  	push	ax
 30300                                  	push	es
 30301                                  
 30302                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30303                                  	jc	short huX
 30304                                  
 30305                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30306                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 30307                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30308                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30309                                  
 30310                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30311                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30312                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30313                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30314                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30315                                  
 30316                                  	call	hideMCB
 30317                                  hu20:	
 30318                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30319                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30320                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30321                                  
 30322                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30323                                  	mov     ax,es
 30324                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30325                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30326                                  	inc     ax
 30327                                  	mov     es,ax
 30328                                  
 30329                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30330                                  huX:	
 30331                                  	pop	es
 30332                                  	pop	ax
 30333                                  	retn
 30334                                  
 30335                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30336                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30338                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30339                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30340                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30341                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30342                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30343                                  
 30344                                  isTiny:
 30345                                  	push	ax
 30346                                  
 30347                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30348                                  	;
 30349                                  	;push	ds
 30350                                  	;push	cs
 30351                                  	;pop	ds
 30352                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30353                                  	;pop	ds
 30354                                  
 30355                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30356                                  
 30357                                  	or	al,al
 30358                                  	pop	ax
 30359                                  	retn
 30360                                  
 30361                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30362                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30363                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30364                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30365                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30366                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30367                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30368                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30369                                  
 30370                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30371                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30372                                  ;	retn
 30373                                  
 30374                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30375                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30376                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30377                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30378                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30379                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30380                                  ; USES:     None
 30381                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30382                                  
 30383                                  hideMCB:
 30384                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30385                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30386                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30387                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30388                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30389                                  	retn
 30390                                  
 30391                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30392                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30393                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30394                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30395                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30396                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30397                                  ; USES:     None
 30398                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30399                                  
 30400                                  unHideMCB:
 30401                                  	push	ax
 30402                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30403                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30404                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30405                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30406                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30407                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30408                                  	pop	ax
 30409                                  	retn
 30410                                  
 30411                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30412                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30413                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30414                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30415                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30416                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30417                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30418                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30419                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30420                                  
 30421                                  findUMB:
 30422                                  	push	ax
 30423                                  	push	cx
 30424                                  	push	dx
 30425                                  
 30426                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30427                                  
 30428                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30429                                  
 30430                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30431                                  	mov	es,ax
 30432                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30433                                  
 30434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30435                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30436                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30437                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30439                                  
 30440                                  fu10:	
 30441                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30442                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30443                                  
 30444                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30445                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30446                                  
 30447                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30448                                  fu20:	
 30449                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30450                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30451                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30452                                  
 30453                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30454                                  	mov     ax,es
 30455                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30456                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30457                                  	inc     ax
 30458                                  	mov     es,ax
 30459                                  
 30460                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30461                                  fuE:	
 30462                                  	stc
 30463                                  fuX:
 30464                                  	pop	dx
 30465                                  	pop	cx
 30466                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30467                                  	retn
 30468                                  
 30469                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30470                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30471                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30472                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30473                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30474                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30475                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30476                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30477                                  
 30478                                  BigFree:
 30479                                  	push	bx
 30480                                  	push	cx
 30481                                  
 30482                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30483                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30484                                  
 30485                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30486                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30487                                  
 30488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30489                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30490                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30491                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30492                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30493                                  
 30494                                  bf10:	
 30495                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30496                                  	jz	short bf30
 30497                                  
 30498                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30499                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30500                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30501                                  
 30502                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30503                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30504                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30505                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30506                                  
 30507                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30508                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30509                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30510                                  
 30511                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30512                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30513                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30514                                  
 30515                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30516                                  	mov     ax,es
 30517                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30518                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30519                                  	inc     ax
 30520                                  	mov     es,ax
 30521                                  
 30522                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30523                                  
 30524                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30525                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30526                                  	or	bx,bx
 30527                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30528                                  bfE:	
 30529                                  	stc
 30530                                  bfX:
 30531                                  	pop	cx
 30532                                  	pop	bx
 30533                                  	retn
 30534                                  
 30535                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30536                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30537                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30538                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30539                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30540                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30541                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30542                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30543                                  
 30544                                  isSpecified:
 30545                                  	push	ax
 30546                                  
 30547                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30548                                  	mov	bl,al
 30549                                  
 30550                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30551                                  	;
 30552                                  	;push	ds
 30553                                  	;push	cs
 30554                                  	;pop	ds
 30555                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30556                                  	;pop	ds
 30557                                  	
 30558                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30559                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30560                                  
 30561                                  	pop	ax
 30562                                  	retn
 30563                                  
 30564                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30565                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30566                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30567                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30568                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30569                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30570                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30571                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30572                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30573                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30574                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30575                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30576                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30578                                  
 30579                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30580                                  
 30581                                  shrinkMCB:
 30582                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30583                                  	push	bx
 30584                                  	push	cx
 30585                                  	push	es
 30586                                  
 30587                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30588                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30589                                  
 30590                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30591                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30592                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30593                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30594                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30595                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30596                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30597                                  
 30598                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30599                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30600                                  
 30601                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30602                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30603                                  
 30604                                  	add	ax,bx
 30605                                  	inc	ax
 30606                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30607                                  
 30608                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30609                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30610                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30611                                  	; ax > 0
 30612                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30613                                  
 30614                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30615                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30616                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30617                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30618                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30619                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30620                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30621                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30622                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30623                                  
 30624                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30625                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30626                                  
 30627                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30628                                  	; cf=0
 30629                                  	;clc
 30630                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30631                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30632                                  smE:	
 30633                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30634                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30635                                  	;stc
 30636                                  smX:	
 30637                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30638                                  	pop	es
 30639                                  	pop	cx
 30640                                  	pop	bx
 30641                                  	retn
 30642                                  
 30643                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30644                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30645                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30646                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30647                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30648                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30649                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30651                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30652                                  ;
 30653                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30654                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30655                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30656                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30657                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30658                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30659                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30660                                  ;       Endif
 30661                                  ;    Endif
 30662                                  ; Endif
 30663                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30664                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30665                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30666                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30667                                  ;    ENDIF
 30668                                  ; ENDIF
 30669                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30670                                  
 30671                                  _hideUMB_:
 30672                                  	push	bx
 30673                                  	push	dx
 30674                                  	push	es
 30675                                  
 30676                                  	mov	al,cl
 30677                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30678                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30679                                  
 30680                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30681                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30682                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30683                                  
 30684                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30685                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30686                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30687                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30688                                  
 30689                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30690                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30691                                  
 30692                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30693                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30694                                  
 30695                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30696                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30697                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30698                                  hu_10:	
 30699                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30700                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30701                                  
 30702                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30703                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30704                                  
 30705                                  	mov	dx,es
 30706                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30707                                  
 30708                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30709                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30710                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30711                                  
 30712                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30713                                  hu_30:	
 30714                                  	mov	al,cl
 30715                                  
 30716                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30717                                  
 30718                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30719                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30720                                  
 30721                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30722                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30723                                  hu_X:	
 30724                                  	pop	es
 30725                                  	pop	dx
 30726                                  	pop	bx
 30727                                  	retn
 30728                                  
 30729                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30730                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30732                                  ; Entry:  None
 30733                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30734                                  ; Error:  None
 30735                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30736                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30737                                  
 30738                                  UnFreeze:
 30739                                  	push	ax
 30740                                  	push	es
 30741                                  
 30742                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30743                                  	jc	short ufX
 30744                                  
 30745                                  	mov	es,ax
 30746                                  
 30747                                  ; ------------------------------
 30748                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30749                                  ; ------------------------------
 30750                                  
 30751                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30752                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30753                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30754                                  uf20:	
 30755                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30756                                  
 30757                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30758                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30759                                  
 30760                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30761                                  	mov     ax,es
 30762                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30763                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30764                                  	inc     ax
 30765                                  	mov     es,ax
 30766                                  
 30767                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30768                                  ufX:	
 30769                                  	pop	es
 30770                                  	pop	ax
 30771                                  	retn
 30772                                  
 30773                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30774                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30775                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30776                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30777                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30778                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30779                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30780                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30781                                  
 30782                                  isFrozMCB:
 30783                                  	;push	ax
 30784                                  
 30785                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30786                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30787                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30788                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30789                                  
 30790                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30791                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30792                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30793                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30794                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30795                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30796                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30797                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30798                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30799                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30800                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30801                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30802                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30803                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30804                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30805                                  ifmX:	
 30806                                  	;pop	ax
 30807                                  	retn
 30808                                  
 30809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30810                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30811                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30812                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30813                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30814                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30815                                  ; USES:     None
 30816                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30817                                  
 30818                                  frezMCB:
 30819                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30820                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30821                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30822                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30823                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30824                                  	retn
 30825                                  
 30826                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30827                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30828                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30829                                  ; Entry:  None
 30830                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30831                                  ; Error:  None
 30832                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30833                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30834                                  
 30835                                  FreezeUM:
 30836                                  	push	ax
 30837                                  	push	cx
 30838                                  	push	dx
 30839                                  	push	es
 30840                                  
 30841                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30842                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30843                                  
 30844                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30845                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30846                                  
 30847                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30848                                  	mov	es,ax
 30849                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30850                                  
 30851                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30852                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30853                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30854                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30855                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30856                                  
 30857                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30858                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30859                                  
 30860                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30861                                  fum20:	
 30862                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30863                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30864                                  
 30865                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30866                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30867                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30868                                  
 30869                                  	call	frezMCB
 30870                                  fum30:	
 30871                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30872                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30873                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30874                                  
 30875                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30876                                  	mov     ax,es
 30877                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30878                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30879                                  	inc     ax
 30880                                  	mov     es,ax
 30881                                  	
 30882                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30883                                  
 30884                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30885                                  	pop	dx
 30886                                  	pop	cx
 30887                                  	pop	ax
 30888                                  	retn
 30889                                  
 30890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30891                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30892                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30893                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30894                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30895                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30896                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30897                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30898                                  
 30899                                  UmbTest:
 30900                                  	push	ax
 30901                                  	push	bx
 30902                                  	push	ds
 30903                                  	push	es
 30904                                  
 30905                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30906                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30907                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30908                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30909                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30910                                  
 30911                                  	pop	es
 30912                                  	pop	ds
 30913                                  	pop	bx
 30914                                  	pop	ax
 30915                                  	retn
 30916                                  
 30917                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30918                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30919                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30920                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30921                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30922                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30923                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30924                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30925                                  
 30926                                  WalkMem:
 30927                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30928                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30929                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30930                                  		   	
 30931                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30932                                  	int	21h
 30933                                  
 30934                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30935                                  	mov	es,ax
 30936                                  
 30937                                  ; ------------------------------
 30938                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30939                                  ; ------------------------------
 30940                                  
 30941                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30942                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30943                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30944                                  
 30945                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30946                                  
 30947                                  	mov     bx,es
 30948                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30949                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30950                                  	inc     bx
 30951                                  	mov     es,bx
 30952                                  		
 30953                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30954                                  um20:	
 30955                                  	mov	ax,es
 30956                                  
 30957                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30958                                  
 30959                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30960                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30961                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30962                                  	retn
 30963                                  
 30964                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30965                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30966                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30967                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30968                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30969                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30970                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30971                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30972                                  
 30973                                  hl_unlink:
 30974                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30975                                  
 30976                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30977                                  	;
 30978                                  	;push	ds
 30979                                  	;push	cs
 30980                                  	;pop	ds
 30981                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30982                                  	;pop	ds
 30983                                  
 30984                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30985                                  
 30986                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30987                                  	int	21h
 30988                                  	retn
 30989                                  
 30990                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30991                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30992                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30993                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30994                                  
 30995                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30996                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30997                                  
 30998                                  ;   Modification log:
 30999                                  ;
 31000                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31001                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31002                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31003                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31004                                  
 31005                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31006                                  
 31007                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31008                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31009                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31010                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31011                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31012                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31013                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31014                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31015                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31016                                  
 31017                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31018                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31019                                  
 31020                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31021                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31022                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31023                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31024                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31025                                  ;    every command execution.
 31026                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31027                                  
 31028                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31029                                  	;
 31030                                  	;push	ds
 31031                                  	;push	cs
 31032                                  	;pop	ds
 31033                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31034                                  	;pop	ds	
 31035                                  
 31036                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31037                                  
 31038                                  	or	al,al
 31039                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31040                                  
 31041                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31042                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31043                                  	retn			; that.
 31044                                  uhu10:	
 31045                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31046                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31047                                  
 31048                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31049                                  	;
 31050                                  	;push	es
 31051                                  	;push	cs
 31052                                  	;pop	es
 31053                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31054                                  	;pop	ds	
 31055                                  
 31056                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31057                                  
 31058                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31059                                  
 31060                                  	pop	ax
 31061                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31062                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31063                                  	retn
 31064                                  
 31065                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31066                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31067                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31069                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31070                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31071                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31072                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31073                                  
 31074                                  he_unlink:
 31075                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31076                                  
 31077                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31078                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31079                                  
 31080                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31081                                  	int	21h
 31082                                  	retn
 31083                                  
 31084                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31085                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31086                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31087                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31088                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31089                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31090                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31091                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31092                                  
 31093                                  FreeUMBs:
 31094                                  	push	ax
 31095                                  	push	es
 31096                                  
 31097                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31098                                  	jc	short fusX
 31099                                  
 31100                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31101                                  fus10:	
 31102                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31103                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31104                                  	call	freeMCB
 31105                                  fus20:	   
 31106                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31107                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31108                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31109                                  
 31110                                  	mov	ax,es
 31111                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31112                                  	inc	ax
 31113                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31114                                  
 31115                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31116                                  fusX:	
 31117                                  	pop	es
 31118                                  	pop	ax
 31119                                  	retn
 31120                                  
 31121                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31122                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31123                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31124                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31125                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31126                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31127                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31128                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31129                                  
 31130                                  isHideMCB:
 31131                                  	;push	ax
 31132                                  
 31133                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31134                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31135                                  
 31136                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31137                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31138                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31139                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31140                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31141                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31142                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31143                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31144                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31145                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31146                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31147                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31148                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31149                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31150                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31151                                  ihm_x:	
 31152                                  	;pop	ax
 31153                                  	retn
 31154                                  
 31155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31156                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31157                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31158                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31159                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31160                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31161                                  ; USES:     AX
 31162                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31163                                  
 31164                                  freeMCB:
 31165                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31166                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31167                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31168                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31169                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31170                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31171                                  	retn
 31172                                  
 31173                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31174                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31175                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31176                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31177                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
