 31178                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31179                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31180                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  
 31182                                  HeadUmb:
 31183                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31184                                  
 31185                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31186                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31187                                  	;push	es
 31188                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31189                                  
 31190                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31191                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31192                                  
 31193                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31194                                  	int	21h
 31195                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31196                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31197                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31198                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31199                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31200                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31201                                  
 31202                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31203                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31204                                  xhu_e:	
 31205                                  	;stc
 31206                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31207                                  xhu_x:	
 31208                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31209                                  	;pop	es	
 31210                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31211                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31212                                  	retn
 31213                                  
 31214                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31215                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31217                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31218                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31219                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31220                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31221                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31222                                  
 31223                                  linkumb:
 31224                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31225                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31226                                  
 31227                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31228                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31229                                  
 31230                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31231                                  	mov	bx,1
 31232                                  	int	21h
 31233                                  lumbX:
 31234                                  	retn
 31235                                  
 31236                                  %endif

 31246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31247                                  ;
 31248                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31249                                  ;
 31250                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31251                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31252                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31253                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31254                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31255                                  ;
 31256                                  ;	Output : none
 31257                                  ;
 31258                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31259                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31260                                  ;
 31261                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31262                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31263                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31264                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31265                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31267                                  
 31268                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31269                                  InitDevLoad:
 31270                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31271                                  	; ds = cs
 31272 0000280C 803E[FB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31273                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31274                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31275 00002811 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31276                                  
 31277                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31278                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31279                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31280                                  ;
 31281                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31282                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31283                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31284                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31285                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31286                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31287                                  ;
 31288                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31289                                  ;
 31290                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31291                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31292                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31293                                  ;	pushf
 31294                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31295                                  ;	popf
 31296                                  ;
 31297                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31298                                  ;
 31299                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31300                                  
 31301                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31302                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31303                                  InitForConv:
 31304                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31305                                  	; ds = cs
 31306 00002813 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31307                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31308 00002816 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31309 00002818 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31310 0000281B E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31311 0000281E 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31312                                  					;  in low memory
 31313                                  InitForHi:
 31314                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31315                                  	; ds = cs
 31316                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31317                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31318                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31319 00002820 A1[F11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31320 00002823 8B16[ED1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31321 00002827 0316[EF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31322 0000282B EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31323                                  
 31324                                  InitForLo:
 31325                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31326                                  	; ds = cs
 31327                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31328 0000282D C606[FB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31329                                  initforlo_x:
 31330                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31331                                  	; ds = cs
 31332                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31333                                  					;  we are loading low
 31334                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31335                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31336 00002832 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31337 00002835 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31338                                  idl1:
 31339 00002839 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31340                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31341                                  	; ds = cs
 31342                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31343                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31344                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31345                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31346 0000283C A3[E01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31347 0000283F 8916[E21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31348 00002843 C706[E41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31349 00002849 A3[E61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31350 0000284C C3                      	retn
 31351                                  
 31352                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31353                                  ;
 31354                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31355                                  ;
 31356                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31357                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31358                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31359                                  ;		   current UMB
 31360                                  ;
 31361                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31362                                  
 31363                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31364                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31365                                  	; ds = cs
 31366                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31367                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31368                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31369 0000284D A1[EF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31370 00002850 0306[ED1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31371 00002854 2B06[F11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31372                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31373                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31374                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31375                                  	;stc
 31376                                  	;retn
 31377                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31378 00002858 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31379 0000285B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31380                                  spcinumb1:
 31381 0000285D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31382                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31383                                  	; ds = cs
 31384 0000285E 3B06[DE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31385                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31386                                  spcinumb2:
 31387 00002862 C3                      	retn
 31388                                  
 31389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31390                                  ;
 31391                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31392                                  ;
 31393                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31394                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31395                                  ;
 31396                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31397                                  
 31398                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31399                                  ;
 31400                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31401                                  ;	push	ds
 31402                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31403                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31404                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31405                                  ;	pop	ds
 31406                                  ;
 31407                                  ;	inc	ax
 31408                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31409                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31411                                  ;	retn
 31412                                  
 31413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31414                                  ;
 31415                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31416                                  ;
 31417                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31418                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31419                                  ;		 the device.
 31420                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31421                                  ;
 31422                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31423                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31424                                  ;	UMB.
 31425                                  ;
 31426                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31427                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31428                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31429                                  ;
 31430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31431                                  
 31432                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31433                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31434                                  
 31435                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31436                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31437                                  	; ds = cs
 31438 00002863 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31439 00002866 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31440 00002869 CD21                    	int	21h
 31441                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31442                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31443                                  
 31444 0000286B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31445 0000286D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31446                                  
 31447 0000286F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31448                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31449                                  	; ds = cs
 31450 00002870 391E[DE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31451                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31452 00002874 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31453 00002876 43                      	inc	bx
 31454                                  
 31455 00002877 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31456 0000287A CD21                    	int	21h
 31457 0000287C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31458                                  
 31459                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31460                                  	;dec	ax
 31461                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31462                                  	;
 31463                                  PrepareMark:
 31464 0000287E 1E                      	push	ds
 31465 0000287F 48                      	dec	ax
 31466 00002880 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31467 00002882 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31468 00002888 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31469 0000288E 40                      	inc	ax
 31470 0000288F 1F                      	pop	ds
 31471                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31472                                  	; ds = cs
 31473                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31474                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31475                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31476 00002890 891E[EF1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31477 00002894 A3[ED1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31478 00002897 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31479                                  	;
 31480                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31481                                  	; cf=0
 31482                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31483 0000289A C3                      	retn
 31484                                  gufd_err:
 31485 0000289B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31486                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31487                                  	; ds = cs
 31488                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31489                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31490                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31491 0000289D A3[EF1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31492 000028A0 A3[ED1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31493 000028A3 A3[F11E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31494 000028A6 F9                      	stc
 31495 000028A7 C3                      	retn
 31496                                  
 31497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31498                                  ;
 31499                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31500                                  ;
 31501                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31502                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31503                                  ;
 31504                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31505                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31506                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31507                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31508                                  ;
 31509                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31510                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31511                                  ;
 31512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31513                                  
 31514                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31515                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31516                                  
 31517                                  DevSetMark:
 31518 000028A8 06                      	push	es
 31519 000028A9 57                      	push	di
 31520 000028AA 1E                      	push	ds
 31521 000028AB 56                      	push	si
 31522 000028AC 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31523 000028AE 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31524 000028B4 40                      	inc	ax
 31525 000028B5 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31526                                  
 31527                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31528                                  
 31529 000028B9 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31530 000028BA 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31531                                  
 31532 000028BF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31533 000028C1 FC                      	cld
 31534                                  dsm_again:
 31535 000028C2 AC                      	lodsb
 31536 000028C3 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31537 000028C5 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31538 000028C7 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31539 000028C9 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31540                                  isit_slash:
 31541 000028CB 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31542 000028CD 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31543 000028CF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31544 000028D1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31545                                  isit_null:
 31546 000028D3 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31547 000028D5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31548 000028D7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31549                                  
 31550 000028D9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31551 000028DC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31552                                  dsm_next_char:
 31553 000028DF AC                      	lodsb
 31554 000028E0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31555 000028E2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31556 000028E4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31557 000028E6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31558 000028E8 AA                      	stosb
 31559 000028E9 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31560                                  blankout:
 31561 000028EB E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31562 000028ED B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31563 000028EF F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31564                                  dsm_exit:
 31565 000028F1 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31566 000028F2 5E                      	pop	si
 31567 000028F3 1F                      	pop	ds
 31568 000028F4 5F                      	pop	di
 31569 000028F5 07                      	pop	es
 31570 000028F6 C3                      	retn
 31571                                  
 31572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ;
 31574                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31575                                  ;
 31576                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31577                                  ;
 31578                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31579                                  ;
 31580                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31581                                  ;	in DevSize
 31582                                  ;
 31583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31584                                  
 31585                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31586                                  SizeDevice:
 31587                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31588                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31589 000028F7 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31590 000028F8 06                      	push	es
 31591 000028F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 31592 000028FA 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31593 000028FC B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31594 000028FF CD21                    	int	21h
 31595 00002901 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31596                                  
 31597 00002903 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31598 00002905 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31599 00002908 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31600 0000290A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31601 0000290C CD21                    	int	21h
 31602 0000290E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31603 00002910 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31604 00002913 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31605 00002916 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?

 31953                                  ;
 31954                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31955                                  ;
 31956                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31957                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31958                                  ;
 31959                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31960                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31961                                  ;
 31962                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31963                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31964                                  ;
 31965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31966                                  
 31967                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31968                                  
 31969                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31970                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31971                                  GetHexNum:
 31972 00002A2B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31973 00002A2D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31974                                  ghn_next:
 31975 00002A2F 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31976 00002A32 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31977 00002A35 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31978 00002A37 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31979 00002A3A 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31980 00002A3C 50                      	push	ax
 31981 00002A3D 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31982 00002A3F E83706                  	call	delim
 31983 00002A42 58                      	pop	ax
 31984                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31985 00002A43 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31986 00002A46 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31987 00002A48 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31988                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31989                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31990 00002A4B 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31991                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31992                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31993                                  ghn_shift1:
 31994 00002A4D D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31995 00002A4F D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31996 00002A51 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31997 00002A53 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31998 00002A55 46                      	inc	si
 31999 00002A56 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32000                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32001 00002A58 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32002 00002A5B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32003 00002A5E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32004 00002A62 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32005                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32006                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32007                                  ghn_shift2:
 32008 00002A64 F8                      	clc
 32009 00002A65 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32010 00002A67 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32011 00002A69 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32012 00002A6B F8                      	clc
 32013 00002A6C C3                      	retn
 32014                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32015                                  ghn_err:
 32016                                  gnib_err:
 32017 00002A6D F9                      	stc
 32018                                  ghn_ret:
 32019                                  gnib_ret:
 32020 00002A6E C3                      	retn

 32026                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32027                                  ;
 32028                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32029                                  ;

 32049 00002A85 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32050 00002A87 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32051 00002A8A C3                      	retn
 32052                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32053                                  ;gnib_err:
 32054                                  ;	stc
 32055                                  ;gnib_ret:

 32127                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32128                                  	; ds = cs
 32129 00002AC4 C606[091F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 32130                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 32131                                  ia_1:
 32132                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32133                                  	; cf=0
 32134                                  	;clc
 32135 00002AC9 C3                      	retn
 32136                                  iau_err:
 32137 00002ACA F9                      	stc
 32138                                  iau_err2:
 32139 00002ACB C3                      	retn

 32141                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32142                                  ;
 32143                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32144                                  ;
 32145                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32148                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32149                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32150                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32151                                  ;				NC
 32152                                  ;			  else 
 32153                                  ;				CY
 32154                                  ;
 32155                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32156                                  ;
 32157                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32158                                  
 32159                                  umb_allocate:
 32160                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32161                                  	; ds = cs
 32162 00002ACC 50                      	push	ax
 32163 00002ACD B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32164 00002ACF BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32165                                  					;   possible
 32166                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32167 00002AD2 FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32168                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32169                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32170                                  					; the largest UMB
 32171 00002AD6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32172 00002AD8 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32173                                  	
 32174 00002ADA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32175                                  
 32176                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32177 00002ADC FF1E[F31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32178                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32179                                  
 32180 00002AE0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32181 00002AE3 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32182                                  	;clc
 32183                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32184                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32185                                  	; cf=0
 32186                                  	;clc 
 32187                                  ua_done:
 32188 00002AE5 58                      	pop	ax
 32189 00002AE6 C3                      	retn
 32190                                  ua_err:
 32191 00002AE7 F9                      	stc
 32192 00002AE8 EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
 32193                                  
 32194                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32195                                  ;
 32196                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32197                                  ;
 32198                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32199                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32200                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32201                                  ;			; DS = data
 32202                                  ;
 32203                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32204                                  ;
 32205                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32206                                  ;
 32207                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32208                                  
 32209                                  umb_insert:
 32210 00002AEA 1E                      	push	ds
 32211                                  
 32212                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32213                                  	; ds = cs
 32214                                  
 32215                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32216 00002AEB 8E1E[0A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32217                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32218 00002AEF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32219 00002AF3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32220 00002AF5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32221                                  ui_next:
 32222 00002AF7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32223                                  					;    new block
 32224 00002AF9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32225                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32226                                  					;    last
 32227 00002AFB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32228 00002B01 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32229                                  					; N: get next block
 32230 00002B03 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32231                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32232 00002B05 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32233 00002B08 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32234                                  
 32235                                  ui_insert:
 32236 00002B0A 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32237 00002B0C 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32238                                  
 32239 00002B0D 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32240 00002B0F F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32241                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32242 00002B11 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32243                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32244 00002B16 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32245                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32246 00002B1C 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32247                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32248 00002B20 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32249                                  
 32250                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32251                                  
 32252 00002B26 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32253 00002B28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32254 00002B2E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32255                                  					; mark as free
 32256 00002B35 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32257                                  					; start & end of new block
 32258 00002B38 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32259                                  
 32260                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32261                                  	
 32262 00002B3D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32263 00002B3F 43                      	inc	bx
 32264 00002B40 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32265 00002B42 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32266                                  
 32267                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32268                                  					; this block
 32269 00002B43 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32270                                  	
 32271 00002B45 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32272 00002B4B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32273 00002B52 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32274 00002B56 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32275                                  
 32276 00002B5D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32277                                  
 32278                                  ui_append:
 32279                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32280 00002B5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32281 00002B64 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32282                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32283                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32284                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32285 00002B6A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32286                                  
 32287 00002B70 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32288 00002B72 40                      	inc	ax
 32289 00002B73 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32290                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32291 00002B75 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32292                                  
 32293 00002B77 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32294                                  
 32295 00002B79 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32296 00002B7F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32297 00002B86 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32298 00002B8A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32299                                  
 32300                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32301 00002B91 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32302 00002B93 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32303 00002B99 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32304                                  					; mark as free
 32305 00002BA0 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32306 00002BA1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32307                                  ui_done:
 32308                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32309 00002BA6 1F                      	pop	ds
 32310                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32311                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32312 00002BA7 C3                      	retn
 32313                                  
 32314                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32315                                  
 32316                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32317                                  ;
 32318                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32319                                  ;
 32320                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32321                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32322                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32323                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32324                                  ;
 32325                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32326                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32327                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32328                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32329                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32330                                  ;
 32331                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32332                                  
 32333                                  umb_coalesce:
 32334                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32335                                  	; ds = cs
 32336 00002BA8 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32337                                  
 32338 00002BA9 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32339                                  
 32340                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32341                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32342 00002BAB 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32343 00002BAF 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32344                                  uc_nextfree:
 32345 00002BB4 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32346 00002BB6 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32347                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32348 00002BB8 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32349 00002BBD 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32350                                  					; N: get next arena
 32351 00002BBF E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32352 00002BC2 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32353 00002BC4 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32354                                  uc_again:
 32355 00002BC6 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32356 00002BC9 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32357                                  uc_check:
 32358 00002BCB 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32359 00002BD0 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32360                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32361 00002BD2 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32362 00002BD7 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32363                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32364 00002BD8 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32365 00002BDC 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32366 00002BDF 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32367 00002BE1 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32368                                  
 32369                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32370                                  ;uc_done:
 32371                                  	;retn
 32372                                  
 32373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32374                                  ;
 32375                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32376                                  ;
 32377                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32378                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32379                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32380                                  ;
 32381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32382                                  
 32383                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32384                                  get_next:
 32385 00002BE3 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32386 00002BE8 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32387                                  _get_next_:
 32388 00002BEA 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32389 00002BEC 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32390 00002BF0 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32391 00002BF1 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32392                                  	;clc
 32393                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32394                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32395                                  	; cf=0
 32396                                  	;clc
 32397 00002BF3 C3                      	retn
 32398                                  gn_err:
 32399 00002BF4 F9                      	stc
 32400                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32401                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32402 00002BF5 C3                      	retn

 32404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32405                                  ;
 32406                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32407                                  ;
 32408                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32409                                  
 32410                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32411                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32412                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32413                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32414                                  	; ds = cs
 32415 00002BF6 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32416 00002BF9 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32417                                  
 32418                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32419                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32420                                  
 32421                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32422                                  	; ds = cs
 32423                                  
 32424 00002BFB CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32425 00002BFD B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32426 00002BFF D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32427                                  
 32428 00002C01 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32429 00002C03 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32430                                  
 32431 00002C05 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32432                                  
 32433 00002C07 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32434 00002C0A 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32435                                  	
 32436 00002C0C 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32437 00002C12 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32438                                  					
 32439 00002C19 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32440 00002C1D 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32441                                  
 32442                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32443                                  
 32444 00002C24 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32445 00002C26 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32446 00002C2C 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32447                                  					; mark as free 
 32448 00002C33 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32449 00002C34 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32450                                  
 32451                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32452                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32453 00002C39 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32454 00002C3D BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32455 00002C40 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32456                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32457                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32458                                  
 32459                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32460                                  
 32461 00002C43 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32462 00002C46 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32463 00002C49 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32464                                  ;scan_next
 32465                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32466                                  scannext:
 32467 00002C4B 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32468 00002C4F 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32469                                  	
 32470 00002C51 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32471 00002C53 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32472 00002C58 40                      	inc	ax
 32473 00002C59 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32474                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32475                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32476 00002C5B EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32477                                  got_last:
 32478 00002C5D 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32479 00002C63 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32480                                  	;clc
 32481                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32482                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32483                                  	; cf=0
 32484                                  	;clc
 32485 00002C69 C3                      	retn
 32486                                  
 32487                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32488                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32489                                  ;	;stc
 32490                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32491                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32492                                  ;	; cf=1
 32493                                  ;	;stc
 32494                                  ;	retn
 32495                                  
 32496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32497                                  ;
 32498                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32499                                  ;
 32500                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32501                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32502                                  ;
 32503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32504                                  
 32505                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32506                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32507                                  	; ds = cs
 32508 00002C6A 833E[ED1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32509                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32510 00002C6F 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32511 00002C71 06                      	push	es
 32512 00002C72 53                      	push	bx
 32513                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32514                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32515                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32516                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32517 00002C73 8B1E[F11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32518 00002C77 2B1E[ED1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32519 00002C7B 8E06[ED1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32520                                  	
 32521 00002C7F B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32522 00002C82 CD21                    	int	21h
 32523                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32524                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32525                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32526 00002C84 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32527 00002C86 48                      	dec	ax
 32528 00002C87 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32529 00002C89 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32530 00002C90 5B                      	pop	bx
 32531 00002C91 07                      	pop	es
 32532                                  su_exit:
 32533 00002C92 C3                      	retn
 32534                                  
 32535                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32536                                  ;
 32537                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 32538                                  ;
 32539                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 32540                                  ;
 32541                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32542                                  
 32543                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32544                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32545                                  	; ds = cs
 32546 00002C93 1E                      	push	ds
 32547 00002C94 06                      	push	es
 32548                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32549 00002C95 803E[091F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32550                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32551 00002C9A 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32552                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32553 00002C9C 8E06[0A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32554                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32555 00002CA0 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32556 00002CA5 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32557                                  ulu_next:
 32558 00002CAA E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32559 00002CAD 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32560 00002CAF 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32561 00002CB1 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32562 00002CB3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32563 00002CB5 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32564                                  ulu_found:
 32565                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32566 00002CB7 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32567                                  ulu_x:
 32568 00002CBC 07                      	pop	es
 32569 00002CBD 1F                      	pop	ds
 32570 00002CBE C3                      	retn

 32572                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32573                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32574                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32575                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32576                                  
 32577                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32578                                  ;
 32579                                  ; Summary:
 32580                                  ;
 32581                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32582                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32583                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32584                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32585                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32586                                  ;
 32587                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32588                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32589                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32590                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32591                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32592                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32593                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32594                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32595                                  ;
 32596                                  ; Example:
 32597                                  ;
 32598                                  ;   [menu]
 32599                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32600                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32601                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32602                                  ;
 32603                                  ;   [network]
 32604                                  ;   include misc
 32605                                  ;   device=foo
 32606                                  ;
 32607                                  ;   [misc]
 32608                                  ;   device=bar
 32609                                  ;   include alternate
 32610                                  ;
 32611                                  ;   [alternate]
 32612                                  ;   device=tar
 32613                                  ;
 32614                                  ;
 32615                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32616                                  ;
 32617                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32618                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32619                                  ;
 32620                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32621                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32622                                  ;   following order:
 32623                                  ;
 32624                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32625                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32626                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32627                                  ;
 32628                                  
 32629                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32630                                  
 32631                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32632                                  
 32633                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32634                                  
 32635                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32636                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32637                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32638                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32639                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32640                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128

 32704 00002CE6 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32705 00002CE9 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax

 32761                                  ;
 32762                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32763                                  ;
 32764                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32765                                  ;
 32766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32767                                  
 32768                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32769                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32770                                  
 32771                                  parseline:
 32772                                  	push	ds
 32773                                  
 32774                                  	push	cs
 32775                                  	pop	ds
 32776                                  
 32777                                  nextswtch:
 32778                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32779                                  	je	short done_line
 32780                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32781                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32782                                  
 32783                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32784                                  
 32785                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32786                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32787                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32788                                  	je	short getparm
 32789                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32790                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32791                                  
 32792                                  getparm:
 32793                                  	call	check_switch
 32794                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32795                                  	jc	short swterr
 32796                                  getnext:
 32797                                  	call	getchr
 32798                                  	jc	short done_line
 32799                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32800                                  swterr:
 32801                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32802                                  
 32803                                  done_line:
 32804                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32805                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32806                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32807                                  	jnz	short okay
 32808                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32809                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32810                                  
 32811                                  okay:
 32812                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32813                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32814                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32815                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32816                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32817                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32818                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32819                                  	; cf=0
 32820                                  	;clc
 32821                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32822                                  exitpl:
 32823                                  	pop	ds
 32824                                  	retn
 32825                                  put_back:
 32826                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32827                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32828                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32829                                  
 32830                                  %endif

 32832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32833                                  ;
 32834                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32835                                  ;
 32836                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32837                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32838                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32839                                  ; error.
 32840                                  ;
 32841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32842                                  
 32843                                  check_switch:
 32844 00002D15 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32845                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32846 00002D18 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32847 00002D1A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32848 00002D1C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32849                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32850 00002D1E 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32851 00002D20 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32852 00002D22 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32853                                  
 32854 00002D24 06                      	push	es
 32855                                  
 32856 00002D25 0E                      	push	cs
 32857 00002D26 07                      	pop	es
 32858                                  
 32859 00002D27 8A0E[9637]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32860 00002D2B B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32861 00002D2D BF[9737]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32862 00002D30 F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32863                                  
 32864 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32865 00002D33 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32866                                  
 32867 00002D35 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32868 00002D38 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32869 00002D3A 8B1E[0337]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32870 00002D3E 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32871 00002D40 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32872                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32873 00002D42 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32874                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32875 00002D44 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32876                                  
 32877 00002D46 E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32878 00002D49 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32879                                  
 32880 00002D4B 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32881 00002D4D 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32882                                  
 32883 00002D4F E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32884 00002D52 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32885                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32886                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32887                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32888                                  	; ds = cs
 32889 00002D53 C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32890 00002D58 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32891                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32892                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32893 00002D5B C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32894 00002D60 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32895                                  
 32896                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32897                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32898                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32899                                  
 32900 00002D61 E80500                  	call	process_num
 32901                                  
 32902                                  done_swtch:
 32903                                  	;clc
 32904                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32905                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32906                                  	; cf=0
 32907                                  	;clc
 32908 00002D64 C3                      	retn
 32909                                  
 32910                                  err_swtch:
 32911 00002D65 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32912                                  err_check:
 32913 00002D67 F9                      	stc
 32914                                  err_chk:
 32915 00002D68 C3                      	retn

 32918                                  ;
 32919                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32920                                  ;
 32921                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32922                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32923                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32924                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32925                                  ;
 32926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32927                                  
 32928                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32929                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)

 32932 00002D6D 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32933                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32934 00002D6F F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32935                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32936 00002D72 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32937 00002D74 A2[0237]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32938                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32939                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32940                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32941                                  	; cf=0

 32944                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32945 00002D78 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 32946                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 32947 00002D7B 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 32948                                  
 32949                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 32950                                  
 32951                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 32952 00002D7D A2[DB35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 32953                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32954                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32955                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32956                                  	; cf=0
 32957 00002D80 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32958                                  try_t:
 32959 00002D81 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 32960 00002D83 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 32961                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32962 00002D85 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 32963                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 32964 00002D88 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 32965                                  
 32966                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 32967 00002D8A A3[DE35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 32968                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32969                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32970                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32971                                  	; cf=0
 32972 00002D8D C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32973                                  try_s:
 32974                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32975 00002D8E F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 32976                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 32977 00002D91 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 32978 00002D93 A3[0037]                	mov	[slim],ax
 32979                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32980                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32981                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32982                                  	; cf=0
 32983 00002D96 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32984                                  
 32985                                  ; must be for number of heads
 32986
