 32989                                  done_ret:
 32990                                  	;clc

 32992                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32993                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 32994                                  	;clc
 32995 00002D9A C3                      	retn

 33091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33092                                  ;
 33093                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33094                                  ;
 33095                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33096                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33097                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33098                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33099                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33100                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33101                                  ;
 33102                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33103                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33104                                  ;
 33105                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33106                                  ;
 33107                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33108                                  
 33109                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33110                                  
 33111                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33112                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33113                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33114                                  	; ds = cs
 33115                                  	
 33116 00002DDD 06                      	push	es
 33117                                  
 33118 00002DDE 0E                      	push	cs
 33119 00002DDF 07                      	pop	es
 33120                                  
 33121 00002DE0 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33122 00002DE2 8A1E[DB35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33123 00002DE6 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33124 00002DE9 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33125                                  
 33126 00002DEB C706[DE35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33127                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33128                                  got_80:
 33129 00002DF1 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table

 33190                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33191                                  
 33192 00002E2F 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33193                                  
 33194                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33195                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33196                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33197                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33198                                  
 33199                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33200                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33201                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33202                                  
 33203 00002E31 833E[EE35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18

 33206 00002E3D 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33207

 33209

 33211                                  
 33212                                  ;	check for 320K
 33213                                  
 33214                                  not_144m:

 33218 00002E4D 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad

 33226

 33228 00002E58 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive

 33230                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33231                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33232                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch

 33572                                  	;mov	byte [cs:cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 33573 00002F7C A2[CE03]                	mov	[cmmt1],al	; store it
 33574 00002F7F C606[CD03]01            	mov	byte [cmmt],1 ; 1 char. so far.
 33575 00002F84 E8A600                  	call	get2
 33576 00002F87 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 33577 00002F89 7413                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33578 00002F8B 3C09                    	cmp	al,tab ; 9
 33579 00002F8D 740F                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33580 00002F8F 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr  ; 0Dh
 33581 00002F91 740B                    	je	short get_cmt_end
 33582 00002F93 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf  ; 0Ah
 33583 00002F95 740E                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33584                                  
 33585                                  	;mov	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33586                                  	;inc	byte [cs:cmmt]
 33587                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33588 00002F97 A2[CF03]                	mov	[cmmt2],al
 33589 00002F9A FE06[CD03]              	inc	byte [cmmt]
 33590                                  
 33591                                  get_cmt_end:
 33592 00002F9E E88C00                  	call	get2
 33593 00002FA1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33594 00002FA3 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 33595                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 33596 00002FA5 E9F9FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 33597                                  
 33598                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 33599 00002FA8 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 33600 00002FAC 47                      	inc	di
 33601 00002FAD E9F1FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 33602                                  
 33603                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 33604 00002FB0 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 33605 00002FB4 47                      	inc	di			; and
 33606 00002FB5 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 33607 00002FB6 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 33608                                  
 33609                                  end_copy_file:
 33610 00002FB8 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 33611 00002FBD 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 33612 00002FBF 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33613 00002FC1 EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 33614                                  
 33615                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 33616 00002FC3 E87D00                  	call	skip_comment
 33617 00002FC6 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33618                                  
 33619 00002FC8 E86200                  	call	get2
 33620 00002FCB E8B300                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 33621 00002FCE 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 33622 00002FD0 EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 33623                                  
 33624                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 33625 00002FD2 E86E00                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 33626 00002FD5 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 33627 00002FD7 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 33628                                  
 33629                                  org51:
 33630 00002FDA AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 33631 00002FDB 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 33632 00002FDD 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 33633 00002FDF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 33634 00002FE1 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 33635                                  					; M051 - Start
 33636                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33637                                  	; ds = cs
 33638 00002FE3 803E[D003]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 33639                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 33640 00002FE8 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 33641 00002FEA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 33642 00002FEC 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 33643 00002FEE 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 33644 00002FF0 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 33645 00002FF2 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 33646 00002FF7 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 33647 00002FF8 FE06[BF2C]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 33648                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 33649                                  					; inserted
 33650 00002FFC EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 33651                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 33652                                  
 33653 00002FFE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 33654 00003000 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 33655 00003002 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 33656                                  
 33657                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 33658                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33659                                  	; ds = cs
 33660 00003004 803E[BF2C]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 33661                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 33662 00003009 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 33663 0000300B 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 33664 00003010 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 33665                                  					; M051 - End
 33666                                  org1_brdg:
 33667 00003011 C606[BF2C]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 33668                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 33669                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 33670 00003016 E976FE                  	jmp	org1
 33671                                  
 33672                                  at_quote:
 33673 00003019 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33674                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33675 0000301E 7407                    	je	short up_level
 33676                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 33677 00003020 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33678 00003025 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 33679                                  
 33680                                  up_level:
 33681                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 33682 00003027 FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 33683 0000302B EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 33684                                  
 33685                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33686                                  ;
 33687                                  ; procedure : get2
 33688                                  ;
 33689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33690                                  
 33691                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33692                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 33693                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33694                                  get2:
 33695 0000302D E304                    	jcxz	noget
 33696                                  	;
 33697                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33698                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 33699                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33700 0000302F 26                      	es	
 33701 00003030 AC                      	lodsb
 33702                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 33703                                  	;inc	si
 33704                                  	;
 33705 00003031 49                      	dec	cx
 33706 00003032 C3                      	retn
 33707                                  noget:
 33708 00003033 59                      	pop	cx
 33709                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33710                                  	; ds = cs
 33711                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 33712                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 33713 00003034 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 33714 00003038 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 33715 0000303C 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33716                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 33717 0000303E 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 33718                                  
 33719                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33720                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 33721                                  ;;	retn
 33722                                  ;;else
 33723                                  ;
 33724                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 33725                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 33726                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 33727                                  ;
 33728                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 33729                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 33730                                  ;;endif
 33731                                  
 33732                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33733 00003042 C3                      	retn
 33734                                  
 33735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33736                                  ;
 33737                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33738                                  ;
 33739                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33740                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33741                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33742                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33743                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33744                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33745                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33746                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33747                                  ;
 33748                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33749                                  
 33750                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33751                                  
 33752                                  skip_comment:
 33753 00003043 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33754                                  
 33755                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33756                                  	; ds = cs	
 33757                                  
 33758 00003045 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33759                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33760 0000304A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33761                                  
 33762 0000304C 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33763                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33764 00003051 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33765                                  
 33766 00003053 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33767                                  	
 33768 00003056 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33769                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33770 0000305A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33771                                  
 33772 0000305C 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33773                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33774 00003061 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33775                                  
 33776 00003063 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33777                                  	
 33778 00003067 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33779                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33780 0000306B 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33781                                  skip_cmmt:
 33782 0000306D E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33783 0000306F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33784 00003072 46                      	inc	si
 33785 00003073 49                      	dec	cx
 33786 00003074 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33787 00003076 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33788                                  no_commt:
 33789 00003078 C3                      	retn
 33790                                  
 33791                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33792                                  %if 0
 33793                                  
 33794                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33795                                  
 33796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33797                                  ;
 33798                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33799                                  ;
 33800                                  ;   INPUT
 33801                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33802                                  ;
 33803                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33804                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33805                                  ;
 33806                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33807                                  ;       All
 33808                                  ;
 33809                                  ;   HISTORY
 33810                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33811                                  ;
 33812                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33813                                  
 33814                                  kbd_read:
 33815                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33816                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33817                                  
 33818                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33819                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33820                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33821                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33822                                  kbd_loop:
 33823                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33824                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33825                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33826                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33827                                          int     16h             ;
 33828                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33829                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33830                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33831                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33832                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33833                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33834                                  
 33835                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33836                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33837                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33838                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33839                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33840                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33841                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33842                                          int     16h             ;
 33843                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33844                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33845                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33846                                          inc     bx
 33847                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33848                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33849                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33850                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33851                                          int     16h             ;
 33852                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33853                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33854                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33855                                  
 33856                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33857                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33858                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33859                                  	
 33860                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33861                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33862                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33863                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33864                                          call    print
 33865                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33866                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33867                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33868                                  kbd_notf5:
 33869                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33870                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33871                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33872                                  
 33873                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33874                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33875                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33876                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33877                                          call    print           ;
 33878                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33879                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33880                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33881                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33882                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33883                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33884                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33885                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33886                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33887                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33888                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33889                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33890                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33891                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33892                                          retn			;
 33893                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33894                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33895                                          retn			;
 33896                                  
 33897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33898                                  ;
 33899                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33900                                  ;
 33901                                  ;   INPUT
 33902                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33903                                  ;
 33904                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33905                                  ;       None
 33906                                  ;
 33907                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33908                                  ;       None
 33909                                  ;
 33910                                  ;   HISTORY
 33911                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33912                                  ;
 33913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33914                                  
 33915                                  set_numlock:
 33916                                          push    ax
 33917                                          push    ds
 33918                                          sub     ax,ax
 33919                                          mov     ds,ax
 33920                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33921                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33922                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33923                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33924                                          jmp     short set_done
 33925                                  not_off:
 33926                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33927                                          stc
 33928                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33929                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33930                                  set_done:
 33931                                          pop     ds
 33932                                          pop     ax
 33933                                          retn
 33934                                  
 33935                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33936                                  
 33937                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33938                                  ;
 33939                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33940                                  ;
 33941                                  ;   INPUT
 33942                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33943                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33944                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33945                                  ;
 33946                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33947                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33948                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33949                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33950                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33951                                  ;
 33952                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33953                                  ;       All
 33954                                  ;
 33955                                  ;   NOTES
 33956                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33957                                  ;
 33958                                  ;   HISTORY
 33959                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33960                                  ;
 33961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33962                                  
 33963                                  menu_check:
 33964                                  
 33965                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33966                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33967                                  
 33968                                          push    cx              ;
 33969                                          push    si              ;
 33970                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33971                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33972                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33973                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33974                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33975                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33976                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33977                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33978                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33979                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33980                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33981                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33982                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33983                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33984                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33985                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33986                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33987                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33988                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33989                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33990                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33991                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33992                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33993                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33994                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33995                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33996                                          call    get_char        ;
 33997                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33998                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33999                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34000                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34001                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34002                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34003                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34004                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34005                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34006                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34007                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34008                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34009                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34010                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34011                                          pop     si              ;
 34012                                          pop     cx              ;
 34013                                  
 34014                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34015                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34016                                  
 34017                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34018                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34019                                  ;
 34020                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34021                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34022                                  ;
 34023                                          call    kbd_read
 34024                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34025                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34026                                  
 34027                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34028                                  
 34029                                  menu_search:
 34030                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34031                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34032                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34033                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34034                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34035                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34036                                  
 34037                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34038                                  
 34039                                  menu_color:
 34040                                          push    cx              ;
 34041                                          push    dx              ;
 34042                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34043                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34044                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34045                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34046                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34047                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34048                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34049                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34050                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34051                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34052                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34053                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34054                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34055                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34056                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34057                                  check_color:                    ;
 34058                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34059                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34060                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34061                                  set_color:
 34062                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34063                                          pop     dx              ;
 34064                                          pop     cx              ;
 34065                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34066                                  
 34067                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34068                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34069                                  
 34070                                  menu_found:
 34071                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34072                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34073                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34074                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34075                                  
 34076                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34077                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34078                                  
 34079                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34080                                  
 34081                                  menu_process:
 34082                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34083                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34084                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34085                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34086                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34087                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34088                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34089                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34090                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34091                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34092                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34093                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34094                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34095                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34096                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34097                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34098                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34099                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34100                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34101                                          stc                     ;
 34102                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34103                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34104                                  menu_numlock:
 34105                                          call    set_numlock
 34106                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34107                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34108                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34109                                  
 34110                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34111                                  
 34112                                  menu_default:
 34113                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34114                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34115                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34116                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34117                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34118                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34119                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34120                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 34121                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34122                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34123                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34124                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34125                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34126                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34127                                  timeout_skip:
 34128                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34129                                  
 34130                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34131                                  
 34132                                  menu_item:
 34133                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34134                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34135                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34136                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34137                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34138                                          stc                     ;
 34139                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34140                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34141                                  
 34142                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34143                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34144                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34145                                  
 34146                                  menu_itemfound:
 34147                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34148                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34149                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34150                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34151                                  
 34152                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34153                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34154                                  ;   description...
 34155                                  
 34156                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34157                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34158                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34159                                          call    skip_token      ;
 34160                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34161                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34162                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34163                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 34164                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34165                                  
 34166                                  menu_nextitem:
 34167                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34168                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34169                                  
 34170                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34171                                  
 34172                                  menu_getdefault:
 34173                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34174                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34175                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34176                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34177                                  menu_valid:
 34178                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 34179                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34180                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34181                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34182                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34183                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34184                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34185                                          push    bx              ;
 34186                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34187                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34188                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34189                                          push    ds              ;
 34190                                          push    es              ;
 34191                                          pop     ds              ;
 34192                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34193                                          pop     ds              ;
 34194                                          pop     bx              ;
 34195                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34196                                          inc     bx              ;
 34197                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34198                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34199                                  menu_nodefault:
 34200                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34201                                  menu_setdefault:
 34202                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34203                                  
 34204                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34205                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34206                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34207                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34208                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34209                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34210                                  
 34211                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34212                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 34213                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34214                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34215                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34216                                  
 34217                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34218                                  
 34219                                  menu_display:
 34220                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34221                                          int     10h             ;
 34222                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34223                                          int     10h             ;
 34224                                          push    es              ;
 34225                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34226                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34227                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34228                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34229                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34230                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34231                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34232                                          int     10h             ;
 34233                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34234                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34235                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34236                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34237                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34238                                  	dec     dl              ;
 34239                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34240                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34241                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34242                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34243                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34244                                  menu_clear:
 34245                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34246                                          pop     es              ;
 34247                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34248                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34249                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34250                                  
 34251                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34252                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34253                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34254                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34255                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34256                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34257                                          int     10h             ;
 34258                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34259                                          call    print           ;
 34260                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34261                                          int     10h             ;
 34262                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34263                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34264                                  
 34265                                  menu_nostatus:
 34266                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34267                                  menu_disploop:
 34268                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34269                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34270                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34271                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34272                                  
 34273                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34274                                  
 34275                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34276                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34277                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34278                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34279                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34280                                          int     10h             ;
 34281                                  
 34282                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34283                                          call    print           ;
 34284                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34285                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 34286                                          call    print           ;
 34287                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 34288                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34289                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34290                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34291                                  
 34292                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34293                                  
 34294                                  menu_autoselect:
 34295                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34296                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34297                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34298                                  menu_abort:
 34299                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34300                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34301                                  
 34302                                  normal_boot:
 34303                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34304                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34305                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34306                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34307                                          jmp     menu_search
 34308                                  
 34309                                  not_topmenu:
 34310                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34311                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34312                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34313                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34314                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34315                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34316                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34317                                          jmp     menu_found
 34318                                  
 34319                                  not_submenu:
 34320                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34321                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34322                                  
 34323                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34324                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34325                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34326                                  
 34327                                  no_selection:
 34328                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34329                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34330                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34331                                          push    ds              ;
 34332                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34333                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34334                                  
 34335                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34336                                  ;
 34337                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34338                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34339                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34340                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34341                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34342                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34343                                  ;
 34344                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34345                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34346                                  
 34347                                  copyblock_loop:
 34348                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34349                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34350                                          pop     bx              ;
 34351                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34352                                  
 34353                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34354                                  
 34355                                  copyblock_begin:
 34356                                          push    ax              ;
 34357                                          push    cx              ;
 34358                                          push    si              ;
 34359                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34360                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34361                                          push    ds              ;
 34362                                          push    cs              ;
 34363                                          pop     ds              ;
 34364                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34365                                          pop     ds              ;
 34366                                          pop     di              ;
 34367                                          pop     si              ;
 34368                                          pop     cx              ;
 34369                                          pop     ax              ;
 34370                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34371                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34372                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34373                                          push    di              ;
 34374                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34375                                          push    ds              ;
 34376                                          push    es              ;
 34377                                          pop     ds              ;
 34378                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34379                                          pop     ds              ;
 34380                                          pop     di              ;
 34381                                  copyblock_check:
 34382                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34383                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34384                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34385                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34386                                  
 34387                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34388                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34389                                          call    get_char        ;
 34390                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34391                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34392                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34393                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34394                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34395                                  ;
 34396                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34397                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34398                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34399                                  ;
 34400                                  move_config:
 34401                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34402                                          push    cx              ;
 34403                                  ;
 34404                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34405                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34406                                  ;
 34407                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34408                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34409                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34410                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34411                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34412                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34413                                  copy_boot: 
 34414                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34415                                          cs
 34416                                  	lodsb
 34417                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34418                                          inc     di              ;
 34419                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34420                                  
 34421                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34422                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34423                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34424                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34425                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34426                                          push    cs              ;
 34427                                          pop     es              ;
 34428                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34429                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34430                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34431                                          je	short l2	;
 34432                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34433                                          inc     si              ;
 34434                                          inc     di              ;
 34435                                          loop    l1              ;
 34436                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34437                                          pop     es              ;
 34438                                  
 34439                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34440                                  
 34441                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34442                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34443                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34444                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34445                                  
 34446                                          push    cx              ;
 34447                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34448                                          pop     cx              ;
 34449                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34450                                          pop     ds              ;
 34451                                  
 34452                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34453                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34454                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34455                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34456                                  ;   is empty.
 34457                                  
 34458                                          push    es              ;
 34459                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34460                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34461                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34462                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34463                                          pop     es
 34464                                  
 34465                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34466                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34467                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34468                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34469                                  
 34470                                  menu_done:
 34471                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34472                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34473                                          push    es              ;
 34474                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34475                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34476                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34477                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34478                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34479                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34480                                          pop     es              ;
 34481                                  menu_exit:
 34482                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34483                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34484                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34485                                          retn
 34486                                  
 34487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34488                                  ;
 34489                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34490                                  ;
 34491                                  ;   INPUT
 34492                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34493                                  ;
 34494                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34495                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34496                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34497                                  ;
 34498                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34499                                  ;       None
 34500                                  ;
 34501                                  ;   NOTES
 34502                                  ;       None
 34503                                  ;
 34504                                  ;   HISTORY
 34505                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34506                                  ;
 34507                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34508                                  
 34509                                  copy_envvar:
 34510                                          push    cx              ;
 34511                                          push    si              ;
 34512                                          push    ds              ;
 34513                                          push    es              ;
 34514                                          push    es              ;
 34515                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34516                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34517                                  
 34518                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34519                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34520                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34521                                  ;
 34522                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34523                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34524                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34525                                  
 34526                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34527                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34528                                          lodsb                   ;
 34529                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34530                                          stc                     ;
 34531                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34532                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34533                                          stc                     ;
 34534                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34535                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34536                                          stc                     ;
 34537                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34538                                          inc     cx              ;
 34539                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34540                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34541                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34542                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34543                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34544                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34545                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34546                                  copy_varsrch:
 34547                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34548                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34549                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34550                                          push    cx              ;
 34551                                          push    si              ;
 34552                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34553                                          pop     si              ;
 34554                                          pop     cx              ;
 34555                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34556                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34557                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34558                                  
 34559                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34560                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34561                                  
 34562                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34563                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34564                                          push    si              ;
 34565                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34566                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34567                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
