 34568                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34569                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34570                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34571                                  
 34572                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34573                                  	es	; 26h
 34574                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34575                                  
 34576                                  	pop     si
 34577                                  copy_envprep:
 34578                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34579                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34580                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34581                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34582                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34583                                  
 34584                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34585                                          push    cx              ;
 34586                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34587                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34588                                          pop     cx              ;
 34589                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34590                                  
 34591                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34592                                          lodsb                   ;
 34593                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34594                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34595                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34596                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34597                                          stosb                   ;
 34598                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34599                                  
 34600                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34601                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34602                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34603                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34604                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34605                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34606                                  
 34607                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34608                                          pop     es              ;
 34609                                          pop     ds              ;
 34610                                          pop     si              ;
 34611                                          pop     cx              ;
 34612                                  
 34613                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34614                                          retn
 34615                                  
 34616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34617                                  ;
 34618                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34619                                  ;
 34620                                  ;   INPUT
 34621                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34622                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34623                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34624                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34627                                  ;       Same as above
 34628                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34629                                  ;
 34630                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34631                                  ;       All
 34632                                  ;
 34633                                  ;   NOTES
 34634                                  ;       None
 34635                                  ;
 34636                                  ;   HISTORY
 34637                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34638                                  ;
 34639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34640                                  
 34641                                  copy_block:
 34642                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34643                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34644                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34645                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34646                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34647                                  
 34648                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34649                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34650                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34651                                  
 34652                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34653                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34654                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34655                                  
 34656                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34657                                          push    di              ;
 34658                                  
 34659                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34660                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34661                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34662                                  
 34663                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34664                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34665                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34666                                  
 34667                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34668                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34669                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34670                                          pop     di              ;
 34671                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34672                                          push    cx              ;
 34673                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34674                                          push    si              ;
 34675                                          dec     dx              ;
 34676                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34677                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34678                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34679                                          pop     si              ;
 34680                                          pop     cx              ;
 34681                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34682                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34683                                  
 34684                                  copy_skip:
 34685                                          pop     di
 34686                                  copy_error:
 34687                                          clc                     ;
 34688                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34689                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34690                                  
 34691                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34692                                  
 34693                                  copy_line:
 34694                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34695                                          inc     di              ;
 34696                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34697                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34698                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34699                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34700                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34701                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34702                                          inc     di              ;
 34703                                          inc     di              ;
 34704                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34705                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34706                                          call    get_char        ;
 34707                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34708                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34709                                          inc     di              ;
 34710                                  copy_next:
 34711                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34712                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34713                                  
 34714                                  copy_nextline:
 34715                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34716                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34717                                  
 34718                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34719                                  ;copy_done:
 34720                                          ;retn
 34721                                  
 34722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34723                                  ;
 34724                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34725                                  ;
 34726                                  ;   INPUT
 34727                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34728                                  ;
 34729                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34730                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34731                                  ;
 34732                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34733                                  ;       DX
 34734                                  ;
 34735                                  ;   NOTES
 34736                                  ;       None
 34737                                  ;
 34738                                  ;   HISTORY
 34739                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34740                                  ;
 34741                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34742                                  
 34743                                  get_linenum:
 34744                                          push    ax              ;
 34745                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34746                                          push    cx              ;
 34747                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34748                                          push    si              ;
 34749                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34750                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34751                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34752                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34753                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34754                                          inc     bx              ;
 34755                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34756                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34757                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34758                                          pop     si              ;
 34759                                          pop     cx              ;
 34760                                          pop     ax              ;
 34761                                          retn
 34762                                  
 34763                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34764                                  ;
 34765                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34766                                  ;
 34767                                  ;   INPUT
 34768                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34769                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34770                                  ;
 34771                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34772                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34773                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34774                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34775                                  ;
 34776                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34777                                  ;       None
 34778                                  ;
 34779                                  ;   NOTES
 34780                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34781                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34782                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34783                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34784                                  ;
 34785                                  ;   HISTORY
 34786                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34787                                  ;
 34788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34789                                  
 34790                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34791                                          push    ax              ;
 34792                                          push    cx              ;
 34793                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34794                                          push    si              ;
 34795                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34796                                          push    ds              ;
 34797                                          push    es              ;
 34798                                          pop     ds              ;
 34799                                          call    find_block      ;
 34800                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34801                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34802                                          pop     ds              ;
 34803                                          pop     si              ;
 34804                                          pop     cx              ;
 34805                                          pop     ax              ;
 34806                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34807                                          retn			;
 34808                                  
 34809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34810                                  ;
 34811                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34812                                  ;
 34813                                  ;   INPUT
 34814                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34815                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34816                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34817                                  ;
 34818                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34819                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34820                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34821                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34822                                  ;
 34823                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34824                                  ;       AX
 34825                                  ;
 34826                                  ;   NOTES
 34827                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34828                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34829                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34830                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34831                                  ;
 34832                                  ;   HISTORY
 34833                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34834                                  ;
 34835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34836                                  
 34837                                  find_block:
 34838                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34839                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34840                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34841                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34842                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34843                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34844                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34845                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34846                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34847                                  check_line:
 34848                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34849                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34850                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34851                                  next_line:
 34852                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34853                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34854                                  ;find_exit:
 34855                                  ;	retn
 34856                                  
 34857                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34858                                  ;
 34859                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34860                                  ;
 34861                                  ;   INPUT
 34862                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34863                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34864                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34865                                  ;
 34866                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34867                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34868                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34869                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34870                                  ;
 34871                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34872                                  ;       AX
 34873                                  ;
 34874                                  ;   NOTES
 34875                                  ;       None
 34876                                  ;
 34877                                  ;   HISTORY
 34878                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34879                                  ;
 34880                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34881                                  
 34882                                  comp_names:
 34883                                          push    di              ;
 34884                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34885                                          call    get_char        ;
 34886                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34887                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34888                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34889                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34890                                          inc     di              ;
 34891                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34892                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34893                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34894                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34895                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34896                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34897                                          pop     di              ;
 34898                                          retn			;
 34899                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34900                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34901                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34902                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34903                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34904                                  
 34905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34906                                  
 34907                                  comp_names_safe:
 34908                                          push    ax
 34909                                          push    cx
 34910                                          push	si
 34911                                          push    ds
 34912                                          push    cs
 34913                                          pop     ds
 34914                                          call    comp_names
 34915                                          pop     ds
 34916                                  	pop	si
 34917                                          pop     cx
 34918                                          pop     ax
 34919                                          retn
 34920                                  
 34921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34922                                  ;
 34923                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34924                                  ;
 34925                                  ;   INPUT
 34926                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34927                                  ;
 34928                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34929                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34930                                  ;
 34931                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34932                                  ;       None
 34933                                  ;
 34934                                  ;   NOTES
 34935                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34936                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34937                                  ;
 34938                                  ;   HISTORY
 34939                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34940                                  ;
 34941                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34942                                  
 34943                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34944                                          push    ax              ;
 34945                                          push    bx              ;
 34946                                          push    cx              ;
 34947                                          push    dx              ;
 34948                                          push    si              ;
 34949                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34950                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34951                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34952                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34953                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34954                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34955                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34956                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34957                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34958                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34959                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34960                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34961                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34962                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34963                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34964                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34965                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34966                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34967                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34968                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34969                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34970                                  print_other:                    ;
 34971                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34972                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34973                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34974                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34975                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34976                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34977                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34978                                          int     10h             ;
 34979                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34980                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34981                                          int     10h             ;
 34982                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34983                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34984                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34985                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34986                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34987                                          int     10h             ;
 34988                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34989                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34990                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34991                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34992                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34993                                          int     10h             ;
 34994                                          push    es              ;
 34995                                  print_loop:                     ;
 34996                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34997                                          inc     di              ;
 34998                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34999                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35000                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35001                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35002                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35003                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35004                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35005                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35006                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35007                                          int     10h             ;
 35008                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35009                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35010                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35011                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35012                                          int     10h             ;
 35013                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35014                                  print_done:                     ;
 35015                                          pop     es              ;
 35016                                          pop     dx              ;
 35017                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35018                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35019                                          pop     si              ;
 35020                                          pop     dx              ;
 35021                                          pop     cx              ;
 35022                                          pop     bx              ;
 35023                                          pop     ax              ;
 35024                                          retn			;
 35025                                  
 35026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35027                                  ;
 35028                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35029                                  ;
 35030                                  ;   INPUT
 35031                                  ;       None
 35032                                  ;
 35033                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35034                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35035                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35036                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35037                                  ;
 35038                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35039                                  ;       None
 35040                                  ;
 35041                                  ;   NOTES
 35042                                  ;       None
 35043                                  ;
 35044                                  ;   HISTORY
 35045                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35046                                  ;
 35047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35048                                  
 35049                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35050                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35051                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35052                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35053                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35054                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35055                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35056                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35057                                          int     21h             ;
 35058                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35059                                  check_time:
 35060                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35061                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35062                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35063                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35064                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35065                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35066                                  show_time:
 35067                                          push    bx              ;
 35068                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35069                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35070                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35071                                          int     10h             ;
 35072                                          push    dx              ;
 35073                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35074                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35075                                          int     10h             ;
 35076                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35077                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35078                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35079                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35080                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35081                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35082                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35083                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35084                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35085                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35086                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35087                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35088                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35089                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35090                                          pop     dx
 35091                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35092                                          int     10h             ;
 35093                                          pop     bx              ;
 35094                                  input_key:
 35095                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35096                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35097                                          int     21h             ;
 35098                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35099                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35100                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35101                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35102                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35103                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35104                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35105                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35106                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35107                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35108                                  got_time:
 35109                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35110                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35111                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35112                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35113                                  got_key:
 35114                                          push    ax              ;
 35115                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35116                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35117                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35118                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35119                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35120                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35121                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35122                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35123                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35124                                          pop     bx   		;
 35125                                  
 35126                                  timeout_disabled:
 35127                                          pop     ax              ;
 35128                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35129                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35130                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35131                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35132                                  
 35133                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35134                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35135                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35136                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35137                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35138                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35139                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35140                                          jmp     short print1
 35141                                  not_up:
 35142                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35143                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35144                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35145                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35146                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35147                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35148                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35149                                  print1: 
 35150                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35151                                  print2: 
 35152                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35153                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35154                                  to_input_key:
 35155                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35156                                  not_down:
 35157                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35158                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35159                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35160                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35161                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35162                                          call    show_status     ;
 35163                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35164                                  not_f8:
 35165                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35166                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35167                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35168                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35169                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35170                                  
 35171                                  normal_key:
 35172                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35173                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35174                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35175                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35176                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35177                                          retn			;
 35178                                  not_backspace:
 35179                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35180                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35181                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35182                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35183                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35184                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35185                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35186                                          jmp	short print2
 35187                                  
 35188                                  select_done:
 35189                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35190                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35191                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35192                                  
 35193                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35194                                  
 35195                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35196                                  
 35197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35198                                  ;
 35199                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ;   INPUT
 35202                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35203                                  ;
 35204                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35205                                  ;       None
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35208                                  ;       None
 35209                                  ;
 35210                                  ;   NOTES
 35211                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35212                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35213                                  ;
 35214                                  ;   HISTORY
 35215                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35216                                  ;
 35217                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35218                                  
 35219                                  disp_input:
 35220                                          push    ax
 35221                                          cmp     al,' '
 35222                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35223                                          mov     al,' '
 35224                                  disp_ok:
 35225                                          mov     dl,al
 35226                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35227                                          int     21h
 35228                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35229                                          call    print
 35230                                          pop     ax
 35231                                          retn
 35232                                  
 35233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35234                                  
 35235                                  disp_num:
 35236                                          push    bx
 35237                                          add     al,'0'
 35238                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35239                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35240                                          mov     cx,1
 35241                                          int     10h
 35242                                          pop     bx
 35243                                          retn
 35244                                  
 35245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35246                                  ;
 35247                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;   INPUT
 35250                                  ;       None
 35251                                  ;
 35252                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35253                                  ;       None
 35254                                  ;
 35255                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35256                                  ;       None
 35257                                  ;
 35258                                  ;   NOTES
 35259                                  ;       None
 35260                                  ;
 35261                                  ;   HISTORY
 35262                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35263                                  ;
 35264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35265                                  
 35266                                  show_status:
 35267                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35268                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35269                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35270                                          int     10h             ;
 35271                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35272                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35273                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35274                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35275                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35276                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35277                                          int     10h             ;
 35278                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35279                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35280                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35281                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35282                                  show_onoff: 
 35283                                          int     10h
 35284                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35285                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35286                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35287                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35288                                  
 35289                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35290                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35291                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35292                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35293                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35294                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35295                                          int     10h             ;
 35296                                  show_done:                      ;
 35297                                          pop     dx              ;
 35298                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35299                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35300                                          pop     bx              ;
 35301                                          retn			;
 35302                                  
 35303                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35304                                  
 35305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35306                                  ;
 35307                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35308                                  ;
 35309                                  ;   INPUT
 35310                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35311                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35312                                  ;
 35313                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35314                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35315                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35316                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35317                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35318                                  ;
 35319                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35320                                  ;       AX
 35321                                  ;
 35322                                  ;   NOTES
 35323                                  ;       None
 35324                                  ;
 35325                                  ;   HISTORY
 35326                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35327                                  ;
 35328                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35329                                  
 35330                                  skip_token:
 35331                                          call    get_char
 35332                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35333                                          call    any_delim
 35334                                          jne	short skip_token
 35335                                  skip_check_eol:
 35336                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35337                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35338                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35339                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35340                                          clc
 35341                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35342                                  	retn
 35343                                  skip_token_eol:
 35344                                          stc
 35345                                  skip_token_done:
 35346                                          retn
 35347                                  
 35348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35351                                  ;
 35352                                  ;   INPUT
 35353                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35354                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35357                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35358                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35359                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35360                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35361                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35362                                  ;
 35363                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35364                                  ;       AX
 35365                                  ;
 35366                                  ;   NOTES
 35367                                  ;       None
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;   HISTORY
 35370                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35371                                  ;
 35372                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35373                                  
 35374                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35375                                          call    get_char        ;
 35376                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35377                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35378                                          call    delim           ;
 35379                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35380                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35381                                  
 35382                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35383                                  ;
 35384                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35385                                  ;
 35386                                  ;   INPUT
 35387                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35388                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35389                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35390                                  ;
 35391                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35392                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35393                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35394                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35395                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35398                                  ;       AX
 35399                                  ;
 35400                                  ;   NOTES
 35401                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35402                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35403                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35404                                  ;
 35405                                  ;   HISTORY
 35406                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35407                                  ;
 35408                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35409                                  
 35410                                  skip_opt_line:
 35411                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35412                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35413                                       
 35414                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35415                                  
 35416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35417                                  ;
 35418                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35419                                  ;
 35420                                  ;   INPUT
 35421                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35422                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35423                                  ;
 35424                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35425                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35426                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35427                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35428                                  ;
 35429                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35430                                  ;       AX
 35431                                  ;
 35432                                  ;   NOTES
 35433                                  ;       None
 35434                                  ;
 35435                                  ;   HISTORY
 35436                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35437                                  ;
 35438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35439                                  
 35440                                  skip_line:
 35441                                          call    get_char
 35442                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35443                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35444                                          jne	short skip_line
 35445                                  skip_line_done:
 35446                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35447                                          retn
 35448                                  
 35449                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35450                                  ;
 35451                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35452                                  ;
 35453                                  ;   INPUT
 35454                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35455                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35456                                  ;
 35457                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35458                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35459                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35460                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35461                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35464                                  ;       AX
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   NOTES
 35467                                  ;       None
 35468                                  ;
 35469                                  ;   HISTORY
 35470                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35473                                  
 35474                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35475                                  
 35476                                  get_number:
 35477                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35478                                  num_loop:
 35479                                          call    get_char        ;
 35480                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35481                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35482                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35483                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35484                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35485                                          push    ax              ;
 35486                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35487                                          push    dx              ;
 35488                                          mul     bx              ;
 35489                                          pop     dx              ;
 35490                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35491                                          pop     ax              ;
 35492                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35493                                          cbw                     ;
 35494                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35495                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35496                                  
 35497                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35498                                  ;num_done:
 35499                                          ;retn
 35500                                  
 35501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35502                                  ;
 35503                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35504                                  ;
 35505                                  ;   INPUT
 35506                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35507                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35508                                  ;
 35509                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35510                                  ;       AL == next character
 35511                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35512                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35515                                  ;       AX
 35516                                  ;
 35517                                  ;   NOTES
 35518                                  ;       None
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ;   HISTORY
 35521                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35522                                  ;
 35523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35524                                  
 35525                                  get_char:
 35526                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35527                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35528                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35529                                  	es	
 35530                                  	lodsb
 35531                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35532                                          retn			;
 35533                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35534                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35535                                  nearby_ret:
 35536                                          retn
 35537                                  
 35538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35539                                  ;
 35540                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35541                                  ;
 35542                                  ;   INPUT
 35543                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35544                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35545                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35546                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35547                                  ;
 35548                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35549                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35550                                  ;
 35551                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35552                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35553                                  ;
 35554                                  ;   NOTES
 35555                                  ;       None
 35556                                  ;
 35557                                  ;   HISTORY
 35558                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35559                                  ;
 35560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35561                                  
 35562                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35563                                  query_user:
 35564                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35565                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35566                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35567                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35568                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35569                                  qu_1:
 35570                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35571                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35572                                          push    ax                      ;
 35573                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35574                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35575                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35576                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35577                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35578                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35579                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35580                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35581                                  query_all:
 35582                                  
 35583                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35584                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35585                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35586                                  
 35587                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35588                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35589                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35590                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35591                                  
 35592                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35593                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35594                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35595                                  find_match:                             ;
 35596                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35597                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35598                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35599                                          inc     di                      ;
 35600                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35601                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35602                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35603                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35604                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35605                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35606                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35607                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35608                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35609                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35610                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35611                                          inc     di                      ;
 35612                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35613                                          int     21h                     ;
 35614                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35615                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35616                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35617                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35618                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35619                                  cmd_notset:
 35620                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35621                                  line_print:                             ;
 35622                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35623                                          es
 35624                                  	lodsb
 35625                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35626                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35627                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35628                                  non_null:                               ;
 35629                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35630                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35631                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35632                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35633                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35634                                  non_space:                              ;
 35635                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35636                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35637                                          int     21h                     ;
 35638                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35639                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35640                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35641                                  
 35642                                  generic_prompt:
 35643                                          call    print                   ;
 35644                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35645                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35646                                          int     16h                     ;
 35647                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35648                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35649                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35650                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35651                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35652                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35653                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35654                                  not_func:
 35655                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35656                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35657                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35658                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35659                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35660                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35661                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35662                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35663                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35664                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
