 35665                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35666                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35667                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35668                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35669                                  
 35670                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35671                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35672                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35673                                  	clc
 35674                                  do_cmd:
 35675                                  	pop     ax			;
 35676                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35677                                  	; cf=0
 35678                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35679                                  	retn
 35680                                  
 35681                                  skip_cmd:
 35682                                  	pop     ax			;
 35683                                  skip_all:
 35684                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35685                                  	stc
 35686                                  	retn
 35687                                  
 35688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35689                                  ;
 35690                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35691                                  ;
 35692                                  ;   INPUT
 35693                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35694                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35695                                  ;
 35696                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35697                                  ;       None
 35698                                  ;
 35699                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35700                                  ;       None
 35701                                  ;
 35702                                  ;   NOTES
 35703                                  ;       None
 35704                                  ;
 35705                                  ;   HISTORY
 35706                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35707                                  ;
 35708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35709                                  
 35710                                  print_error:
 35711                                          push    ax
 35712                                          push    bx
 35713                                          push    cx
 35714                                          push    dx
 35715                                          push    ds
 35716                                          push    cs
 35717                                          pop     ds
 35718                                          pushf
 35719                                          call    get_linenum
 35720                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35721                                          call    error_line
 35722                                          popf
 35723                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35724                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35725                                          call    print
 35726                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35727                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35728                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35729                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35730                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35731                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35732                                  pe_1:     
 35733                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35734                                          call    print
 35735                                  pe_ret: 
 35736                                  	pop     ds
 35737                                          pop     dx
 35738                                          pop     cx
 35739                                          pop     bx
 35740                                          pop     ax
 35741                                  	retn
 35742                                  
 35743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35744                                  
 35745                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35746                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35747                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35748                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35749                                  
 35750                                  disable_autoexec:
 35751                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35752                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35753                                  
 35754                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35755                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35756                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35757                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35758                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35759                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35760                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35761                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35762                                  dae_1:
 35763                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35764                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35765                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35766                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35767                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35768                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35769                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35770                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35771                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35772                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35773                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35774                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35775                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35776                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35777                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35778                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35779                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35780                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35781                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35782                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35783                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35784                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35785                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35786                                          retn
 35787                                  
 35788                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35789                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35790                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35791                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35792                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35793                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35794                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35795                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35796                                  
 35797                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35798                                  
 35799                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35800                                  
 35801                                  
 35802                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35803                                  
 35804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35805                                  ;
 35806                                  ; procedure : delim
 35807                                  ;
 35808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35809                                  
 35810                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35811                                  ;
 35812                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35813                                  ;
 35814                                  ;any_delim:
 35815                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35816                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35817                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35818                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35819                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35820                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35821                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35822                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35823                                  ;
 35824                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35825                                  
 35826                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35827                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35828                                  delim:
 35829 00003079 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35830 0000307B 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35831                                  
 35832 0000307D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35833 0000307F 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35834                                  
 35835                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35836 00003081 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35837 00003083 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35838 00003085 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35839 00003087 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35840 00003089 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35841 0000308B 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35842 0000308D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35843 0000308F 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35844 00003091 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35845                                  
 35846                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35847                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35848                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35849                                  ;	clc
 35850                                  ;;endif
 35851                                  
 35852                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35853                                  delim_ret:
 35854 00003093 C3                      	retn
 35855                                  
 35856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35857                                  ;
 35858                                  ; procedure : newline
 35859                                  ;
 35860                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35861                                  ;
 35862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35863                                  
 35864                                  newline:
 35865 00003094 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35866 00003097 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35867 00003099 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35868 0000309B 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35869 0000309D E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35870                                  nl_ret:
 35871 000030A0 C3                      	retn

 35874                                  ; 
 35875                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35876                                  ;
 35877                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35878                                  
 35879                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35880                                  mapcase:
 35881 000030A1 51                      	push	cx
 35882 000030A2 56                      	push	si
 35883 000030A3 1E                      	push	ds
 35884                                  
 35885 000030A4 06                      	push	es
 35886 000030A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 35887                                  
 35888                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35889                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35890                                  ;
 35891                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35892                                  ;;else
 35893                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35894                                  ;;endif
 35895                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35896 000030A6 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35897                                  
 35898                                  convloop:
 35899 000030A8 AC                      	lodsb
 35900 000030A9 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35901 000030AB 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35902 000030AD 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35903 000030AF 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35904 000030B1 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35905 000030B3 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35906                                  noconv:
 35907                                  
 35908                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35909                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35910                                  ;;
 35911                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35912                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35913                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35914                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35915                                  ;;
 35916                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35917                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35918                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35919                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35920                                  ;check_eol:
 35921                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35922                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35923                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35924                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35925                                  ;;endif
 35926                                  	
 35927                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35928 000030B6 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35929                                  convdone:
 35930 000030B8 1F                      	pop	ds
 35931 000030B9 5E                      	pop	si
 35932 000030BA 59                      	pop	cx
 35933 000030BB C3                      	retn
 35934                                  
 35935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35936                                  ;
 35937                                  ; procedure : round
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35940                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35941                                  ;
 35942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35943                                  
 35944                                  round:
 35945 000030BC 50                      	push	ax
 35946 000030BD 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35947                                  
 35948 000030C1 E8F5DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35949                                  
 35950 000030C4 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35951 000030C9 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35952 000030D0 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35953 000030D4 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35954 000030D9 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35955 000030DB 2EF606[2E14]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35956 000030E1 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35957 000030E3 06                      	push	es
 35958 000030E4 56                      	push	si
 35959 000030E5 2E8B36[2C14]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35960 000030EA 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35961 000030EC 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35962 000030EE 48                      	dec	ax
 35963                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35964 000030EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35965 000030F3 2E8026[2E14]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35966 000030F9 5E                      	pop	si
 35967 000030FA 07                      	pop	es
 35968                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35969 000030FB 58                      	pop	ax
 35970                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35971                                  	; cf = 0
 35972                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35973                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35974 000030FC C3                      	retn
 35975

 35983 000030FF BA[9D38]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35986 00003102 E87602                  	call	print

 36012                                  ;

 36014                                  
 36015                                  todigit:
 36016 0000312B 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36017                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36018                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36019 0000312D 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36020                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36021                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36022                                  	;clc
 36023                                  	;retn
 36024                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36025 0000312F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 36026 00003131 F5                      	cmc
 36027                                  notdig:
 36028                                  	;stc
 36029                                  notdig2:

 36032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36033                                  ;
 36034                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36035                                  ;
 36036                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36037                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36038                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36039                                  ;
 36040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36041                                  
 36042                                  getnum:
 36043 00003133 53                      	push	bx
 36044 00003134 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36045                                  b2:
 36046 00003136 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36047 00003139 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36048                                  
 36049 0000313B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36050 0000313C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36051                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36052                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36053 0000313D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36054 0000313F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36055 00003141 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36056 00003142 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36057 00003144 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36058 00003147 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36059                                  
 36060 00003149 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36061                                  
 36062 0000314A E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36063 0000314D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36064 0000314F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36065 00003151 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36066 00003153 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36067 00003155 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36068 00003157 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36069 00003159 7417                    	je	short b15
 36070 0000315B 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36071 00003160 7410                    	je	short b15
 36072 00003162 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36073                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36074                                  	;nop
 36075                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36076                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36077                                  	;nop
 36078                                  	;nop
 36079 00003164 740C                    	je	short b15
 36080 00003166 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36081 00003168 7408                    	je	short b15
 36082 0000316A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36083 0000316C 7404                    	je	short b15
 36084 0000316E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36085 00003170 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36086                                  b15:
 36087 00003172 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36088 00003177 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36089                                  b1:
 36090 0000317C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36091 0000317E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36092 00003180 5B                      	pop	bx
 36093 00003181 C3                      	retn
 36094                                  badnum:
 36095                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36096                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36097 00003182 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36098                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36099 00003184 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36100 00003188 5B                      	pop	bx
 36101 00003189 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36102 0000318A C3                      	retn
 36103                                  
 36104                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36105                                  
 36106                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36107                                  
 36108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36109                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36110                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36111                                  ;	si = 0
 36112                                  ;	ax = country id
 36113                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36114                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36115                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36116                                  ;
 36117                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36118                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36119                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36120                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36122                                  
 36123 0000318B 57                      	push	di
 36124 0000318C 50                      	push	ax
 36125 0000318D 52                      	push	dx
 36126                                  
 36127 0000318E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36128 00003190 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36129 00003192 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36130 00003195 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36131 00003198 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36132                                  
 36133 0000319A 06                      	push	es
 36134 0000319B 56                      	push	si
 36135                                  
 36136 0000319C 0E                      	push	cs
 36137 0000319D 07                      	pop	es
 36138                                  
 36139 0000319E BF[BF34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36140 000031A1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36141 000031A4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36142                                  
 36143 000031A6 5E                      	pop	si
 36144 000031A7 07                      	pop	es
 36145 000031A8 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36146                                  
 36147 000031AA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36148 000031AD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36149 000031B0 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36150                                  
 36151 000031B2 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36152 000031B3 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36153 000031B5 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36154 000031B8 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36155 000031BB E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36156 000031BE 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36157                                  
 36158 000031C0 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36159 000031C2 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36160 000031C6 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36161                                  
 36162 000031C8 46                      	inc	si
 36163 000031C9 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36164 000031CA 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36165 000031CB 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36166 000031CC 5F                      	pop	di
 36167                                  
 36168                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36169 000031CD 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36170 000031D0 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36171                                  
 36172 000031D2 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36173 000031D5 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36174 000031D7 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36175 000031DA 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36176                                  
 36177                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36178 000031DC 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36179 000031DE 46                      	inc	si
 36180 000031DF 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36181 000031E0 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36182                                  
 36183 000031E2 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36184                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36185 000031E5 F9                      	stc
 36186 000031E6 C3                      	retn
 36187                                  
 36188                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36189 000031E7 5E                      	pop	si
 36190 000031E8 59                      	pop	cx
 36191 000031E9 5F                      	pop	di
 36192 000031EA EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36193                                  
 36194                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36195 000031EC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36196                                  
 36197                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36198 000031EF 2E8916[C734]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36199 000031F4 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36200 000031F7 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36201 000031FA B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36202 000031FD E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36203 00003200 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36204                                  
 36205 00003202 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36206 00003204 46                      	inc	si
 36207 00003205 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36208                                  
 36209                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36210 00003206 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36211 00003207 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36212 00003208 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36213                                  
 36214 00003209 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 36215 0000320C E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36216 0000320F 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36217                                  
 36218 00003211 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36219 00003214 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36220 00003217 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36221 0000321A F9                      	stc
 36222 0000321B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36223 0000321D 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36224                                  
 36225 0000321F BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36226 00003222 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36227 00003225 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36228 00003227 F9                      	stc
 36229 00003228 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36230 0000322A 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36231                                  
 36232 0000322C 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36233 0000322E 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36234                                  
 36235 00003230 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36236 00003233 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36237 00003236 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36238 00003239 F9                      	stc
 36239 0000323A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36240 0000323C 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36241                                  
 36242 0000323E 56                      	push	si
 36243 0000323F BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36244 00003242 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36245 00003244 5E                      	pop	si
 36246 00003245 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36247 00003248 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36248 0000324B B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36249 0000324D F9                      	stc
 36250 0000324E CD21                    	int	21h
 36251 00003250 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36252                                  
 36253 00003252 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36254 00003254 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36255                                  
 36256 00003256 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36257 00003259 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36258 0000325C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36259 0000325E 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36260 0000325F 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36261 00003260 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36262 00003264 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36263                                  
 36264                                  	;if	bugfix
 36265 00003266 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36266                                  	;endif
 36267                                  
 36268 00003269 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36269 0000326B 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36270                                  
 36271 0000326D 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36272                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36273 00003271 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36274                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36275                                  	
 36276 00003275 57                      	push	di			;save di
 36277                                  
 36278 00003276 50                      	push	ax
 36279 00003277 2EA1[C734]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36280 0000327B 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36281 0000327E 58                      	pop	ax
 36282                                  
 36283                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 36289 00003286 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 36290                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 36291 0000328A 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36292                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36293                                  
 36294                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 36295 0000328E 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 36296 0000328F 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 36297 00003290 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 36298 00003291 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36299 00003293 46                      	inc	si
 36300 00003294 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36301 00003295 49                      	dec	cx
 36302 00003296 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36303 00003299 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36304 0000329B E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36305

 36307                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 36308                                  	;retn

 36311                                  
 36312                                  	;if	bugfix
 36313                                  
 36314                                  setdbcs_before_copy:
 36315 0000329E 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 36316 000032A0 7516                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 36317 000032A2 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36318 000032A6 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 36319                                  
 36320 000032A8 57                      	push	di
 36321 000032A9 50                      	push	ax
 36322 000032AA 51                      	push	cx

 36324 000032AE 83C702                  	add	di,2			; points actual data

 36328 000032B6 58                      	pop	ax
 36329 000032B7 5F                      	pop	di
 36330                                  sdbcsbc:
 36331                                  setdoscntry_ok:	; 18/12/2022	
 36332 000032B8 C3                      	retn
 36333                                  
 36334                                  	;endif
 36335                                  
 36336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36337                                  
 36338                                  getcountrydestination:
 36339                                  
 36340                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36341                                  ;input: al - data id
 36342                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36343                                  ;on return:
 36344                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36345                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36346                                  
 36347 000032B9 51                      	push	cx
 36348                                  	;add	di,74
 36349 000032BA 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36350                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36351 000032BD 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36352 000032C0 47                      	inc	di
 36353 000032C1 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36354                                  
 36355                                  getcntrydest:
 36356 000032C2 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 36357 000032C5 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 36358 000032C7 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 36359 000032CB 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36360                                  
 36361 000032CD 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36362 000032D0 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36363                                  
 36364                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36365                                  	;add	di,41
 36366 000032D2 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 36367                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 36368 000032D5 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 36369 000032D7 F9                      	stc
 36370 000032D8 EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36371                                  
 36372                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 36373 000032DA 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 36374 000032DC 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 36375                                  
 36376 000032DE 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 36377 000032DF EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 36378                                  
 36379                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 36380 000032E1 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 36381                                  
 36382                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 36383 000032E5 59                      	pop	cx
 36384 000032E6 C3                      	retn

 36386                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36387                                  
 36388                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36389                                  
 36390                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36391                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36392                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36393                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36394                                  ;	 be moved.
 36395                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36396                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36397                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36398                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36399                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36400                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36401                                  
 36402 000032E7 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36403 000032E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36404 000032EB F9                      	stc
 36405 000032EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36406 000032EE 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36407 000032EF 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36408                                  
 36409 000032F1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36410 000032F3 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36411 000032F5 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36412 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36413 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36414                                  ricb_exit:
 36415 000032FA C3                      	retn
 36416                                  
 36417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36418                                  
 36419                                  set_country_path:
 36420                                  
 36421                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36422                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36423                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36424                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36425                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36426                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36427                                  
 36428 000032FB 56                      	push	si
 36429                                  
 36430 000032FC 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36431 000032FD 06                      	push	es
 36432 000032FE 1F                      	pop	ds
 36433 000032FF 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 36434                                  
 36435 00003300 E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 36436 00003303 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 36437                                  
 36438 00003305 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36439 00003307 46                      	inc	si
 36440 00003308 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 36441 00003309 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36442                                  
 36443                                  scp_default_drv:
 36444 0000330B B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36445 0000330D CD21                    	int	21h
 36446 0000330F 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36447                                  
 36448                                  scp_setdrv:
 36449 00003311 2EA2[7C34]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36450 00003315 BF[7F34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36451 00003318 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36452 0000331A 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36453 0000331C 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36454                                  
 36455 0000331E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36456 00003320 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36457                                  
 36458 00003322 EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36459                                  
 36460                                  scp_root_dir:
 36461 00003324 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36462                                  scp_path:
 36463 00003325 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36464                                  
 36465 00003328 BF[7C34]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36466                                  scpath_exit:
 36467                                  
 36468 0000332B 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36469 0000332C 06                      	push	es
 36470 0000332D 1F                      	pop	ds
 36471 0000332E 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36472                                  
 36473 0000332F 5E                      	pop	si
 36474 00003330 C3                      	retn
 36475                                  
 36476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36477                                  
 36478                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36479                                  
 36480                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36481                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36482                                  ;carry set if not.
 36483                                  
 36484 00003331 50                      	push	ax
 36485 00003332 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 36486                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 36487 00003335 720E                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 36488 00003337 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 36489 0000333A 7708                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 36490 0000333C 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 36491 00003340 7502                    	jne	short cdletter_no
 36492                                  
 36493 00003342 EB01                    	jmp	short cdletter_exit
 36494                                  
 36495                                  cdletter_no:
 36496 00003344 F9                      	stc
 36497                                  cdletter_exit:
 36498 00003345 58                      	pop	ax
 36499 00003346 C3                      	retn

 36502                                  
 36503                                  move_asciiz:
 36504                                  
 36505                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 36506                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 36507                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 36508                                  
 36509                                  masciiz_loop:
 36510 00003347 A4                      	movsb
 36511 00003348 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 36512 0000334C 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 36513 0000334E C3                      	retn
